h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T4.0001^ea^ ^a^M2.0395^ea^ ^a^V2.0153^ea^ ^a^P4.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[01] ``sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi sattahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu laabhakaamo ^a^V2.0154^ea^ ca hoti, sakkaarakaamo ca hoti, anava~n~nattikaamo ca hoti, ahiriko ca hoti, anottappii ca, paapiccho ca, micchaadi.t.thi ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.

[01] ``sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti, manaapo ca ^a^T4.0002^ea^ garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi sattahi? idha ^a^P4.0002^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na laabhakaamo ca hoti, na sakkaarakaamo ca hoti, na anava~n~nattikaamo ca hoti, hirimaa ca hoti, ottappii ca, appiccho ^a^M2.0396^ea^ ca, sammaadi.t.thi ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi sattahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu laabhakaamo ca hoti, sakkaarakaamo ca hoti, anava~n~nattikaamo ca hoti, ahiriko ca hoti, anottappii ca, issukii ca, maccharii ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.

[01] ``sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu+ sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi sattahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na laabhakaamo ca hoti, na sakkaarakaamo ca hoti, na anava~n~nattikaamo ca hoti, hirimaa ca hoti, ottappii ca, anissukii ca, amaccharii ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame...pe0... sattimaani ^a^P4.0003^ea^, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani satta? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, hiriibala.m ^a^V2.0155^ea^, ottappabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, satta balaaniiti.
[21] ``saddhaabala.m ^a^T4.0003^ea^ viiriya~nca, hirii {hiri (sii0 pii0 ka0)} ottappiya.m bala.m.
[27] satibala.m samaadhi ca, pa~n~naa ve sattama.m bala.m.
[22] etehi balavaa bhikkhu, sukha.m jiivati pa.n.dito.
[21] ``yoniso ^a^M2.0397^ea^ vicine dhamma.m, pa~n~naayattha.m vipassati.
[22] pajjotasseva nibbaana.m, vimokkho hoti cetaso''ti.. tatiya.m.
[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``sattimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani satta? saddhaabala, viiriyabala.m, hiriibala.m, ottappabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, hiriibala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako hirimaa hoti, hiriiyati kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, hiriiyati paapakaana.m ^a^P4.0004^ea^ akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, hiriibala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, ottappabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ottappii hoti, ottappati ^a^V2.0156^ea^ kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, ottappati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ottappabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, satibala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ^a^T4.0004^ea^ satimaa hoti paramena satinepakkena samannaagato cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa anussaritaa. ida.m, vuccati, bhikkhave, satibala.m.
[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, samaadhibala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, samaadhibala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^M2.0398^ea^, bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, satta balaaniiti.
[21] ``saddhaabala.m viiriya~nca, hirii ottappiya.m bala.m.
[27] satibala.m samaadhi ca, pa~n~naa ve sattama.m bala.m.
[22] etehi balavaa bhikkhu, sukha.m jiivati pa.n.dito..
[21] ``yoniso vicine dhamma.m, pa~n~naayattha.m vipassati.
[22] pajjotasseva nibbaana.m, vimokkho hoti cetaso''ti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``sattimaani, bhikkhave, dhanaani. katamaani satta? saddhaadhana.m, siiladhana.m, hiriidhana.m, ottappadhana.m, sutadhana.m, caagadhana.m, pa~n~naadhana.m. imaani ^a^P4.0005^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, satta dhanaaniiti.
[21] ``saddhaadhana.m ^a^V2.0157^ea^ siiladhana.m, hirii ottappiya.m dhana.m.
[22] sutadhana~nca caago ca, pa~n~naa ve sattama.m dhana.m..
[21] ``yassa ete dhanaa atthi, itthiyaa purisassa vaa.
[22] adaliddoti ta.m aahu, amogha.m tassa jiivita.m..
[21] ``tasmaa ^a^T4.0005^ea^ saddha~nca siila~nca, pasaada.m dhammadassana.m.
[22] anuyu~njetha medhaavii, sara.m {vara.m (ka0)} buddhaana saasana''nti.. pa~ncama.m.
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``sattimaani, bhikkhave, dhanaani. katamaani satta? saddhaadhana.m, siiladhana.m, hiriidhana.m, ottappadhana.m, sutadhana.m, caagadhana.m, pa~n~naadhana.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, saddhaadhana.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0... buddho bhagavaa'ti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhaadhana.m.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^M2.0399^ea^, bhikkhave, siiladhana.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, siiladhana.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, hiriidhana.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako hiriimaa hoti, hiriiyati kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, hiriidhana.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, ottappadhana.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ottappii hoti, ottappati kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, ottappati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ottappadhana.m.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^V2.0158^ea^, bhikkhave, sutadhana.m? idha ^a^P4.0006^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti. tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa ^a^T4.0006^ea^ suppa.tividdhaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sutadhana.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, caagadhana.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako vigatamalamaccherena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati muttacaago payatapaa.ni vossaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, caagadhana.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, pa~n~naadhana.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako pa~n~navaa hoti...pe0... sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pa~n~naadhana.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, sattadhanaaniiti.
[21] ``saddhaadhana.m siiladhana.m, hirii ottappiya.m dhana.m.
[22] sutadhana~nca caago ca, pa~n~naa ve sattama.m dhana.m..
[21] ``yassa ete dhanaa atthi, itthiyaa purisassa vaa.
[22] adaliddoti ta.m aahu, amogha.m tassa jiivita.m..
[21] ``tasmaa saddha~nca siila~nca, pasaada.m dhammadassana.m.
[22] anuyu~njetha medhaavii, sara.m buddhaana saasana''nti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0400^ea^ kho uggo raajamahaamatto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho uggo raajamahaamatto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``acchariya.m ^a^V2.0159^ea^, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava a.d.dho caaya.m, bhante, migaaro roha.neyyo yaava mahaddhano yaava mahaabhogo''ti. ``kiiva a.d.dho ^a^P4.0007^ea^ panugga, migaaro roha.neyyo, kiiva mahaddhano, kiiva mahaabhogo''ti? ``sata.m, bhante, satasahassaana.m {sahassaana.m (sii0), sahassaani (syaa0), satasahassaani (?)} hira~n~nassa, ko pana vaado ruupiyassaa''ti! ``atthi kho eta.m, ugga, dhana.m neta.m `natthii'ti vadaamiiti ^a^T4.0007^ea^. ta~nca kho eta.m, ugga, dhana.m saadhaara.na.m agginaa udakena raajuuhi corehi appiyehi daayaadehi. satta kho imaani, ugga, dhanaani asaadhaara.naani agginaa udakena raajuuhi corehi appiyehi daayaadehi. katamaani satta? saddhaadhana.m, siiladhana.m, hiriidhana.m, ottappadhana.m, sutadhana.m, caagadhana.m, pa~n~naadhana.m. imaani kho, ugga, satta dhanaani asaadhaara.naani agginaa udakena raajuuhi corehi appiyehi daayaadehiiti.
[21] ``saddhaadhana.m siiladhana.m, hirii ottappiya.m dhana.m.
[22] sutadhana~nca caago ca, pa~n~naa ve sattama.m dhana.m..
[21] ``yassa ete dhanaa atthi, itthiyaa purisassa vaa.
[22] sa ve mahaddhano loke, ajeyyo devamaanuse..
[21] ``tasmaa saddha~nca siila~nca, pasaada.m dhammadassana.m.
[22] anuyu~njetha medhaavii, sara.m buddhaana saasana''nti.. sattama.m.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``sattimaani, bhikkhave, sa.myojanaani. katamaani satta? anunayasa.myojana.m, pa.tighasa.myojana.m, di.t.thisa.myojana.m, vicikicchaasa.myojana.m, maanasa.myojana.m, bhavaraagasa.myojana.m, avijjaasa.myojana.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, satta sa.myojanaanii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``sattanna.m ^a^M2.0401^ea^, bhikkhave, sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya samucchedaaya brahmacariya.m vussati. katamesa.m ^a^V2.0160^ea^ sattanna.m? anunayasa.myojanassa ^a^P4.0008^ea^ pahaanaaya samucchedaaya brahmacariya.m vussati, pa.tighasa.myojanassa...pe0... di.t.thisa.myojanassa... vicikicchaasa.myojanassa... maanasa.myojanassa... bhavaraagasa.myojanassa ^a^T4.0008^ea^... avijjaasa.myojanassa pahaanaaya samucchedaaya brahmacariya.m vussati. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, sattanna.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya samucchedaaya brahmacariya.m vussati. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno anunayasa.myojana.m pahiina.m hoti ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.m kata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma.m. pa.tighasa.myojana.m...pe0... di.t.thisa.myojana.m... vicikicchaasa.myojana.m... maanasa.myojana.m... bhavaraagasa.myojana.m... avijjaasa.myojana.m pahiina.m hoti ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.m kata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu acchecchi ta.nha.m, vivattayi sa.myojana.m, sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``sattimaani, bhikkhave, sa.myojanaani. katamaani satta? anunayasa.myojana.m, pa.tighasa.myojana.m, di.t.thisa.myojana.m, vicikicchaasa.myojana.m, maanasa.myojana.m, issaasa.myojana.m, macchariyasa.myojana.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, satta sa.myojanaanii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] dhanavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] dve ^a^P4.0009^ea^ piyaani bala.m dhana.m, sa.mkhitta~nceva vitthata.m.
[22] ugga.m sa.myojana~nceva, pahaana.m macchariyena caati..

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``sattime ^a^V2.0161^ea^, bhikkhave, anusayaa. katame satta? kaamaraagaanusayo, pa.tighaanusayo ^a^T4.0009^ea^, di.t.thaanusayo, vicikicchaanusayo, maanaanusayo, bhavaraagaanusayo ^a^M2.0402^ea^, avijjaanusayo. ime kho, bhikkhave, satta anusayaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``sattanna.m, bhikkhave, anusayaana.m pahaanaaya samucchedaaya brahmacariya.m vussati. katamesa.m sattanna.m? kaamaraagaanusayassa pahaanaaya samucchedaaya brahmacariya.m vussati, pa.tighaanusayassa...pe0... di.t.thaanusayassa... vicikicchaanusayassa... maanaanusayassa... bhavaraagaanusayassa... avijjaanusayassa pahaanaaya samucchedaaya brahmacariya.m vussati. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, sattanna.m anusayaana.m pahaanaaya samucchedaaya brahmacariya.m vussati.

[03] ``yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kaamaraagaanusayo pahiino hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. pa.tighaanusayo...pe0... di.t.thaanusayo... vicikicchaanusayo... maanaanusayo... bhavaraagaanusayo... avijjaanusayo pahiino hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu acchecchi ta.nha.m, vivattayi sa.myojana.m, sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``sattahi ^a^P4.0010^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagata.m kula.m anupagantvaa vaa naala.m upagantu.m, upagantvaa ^a^V2.0162^ea^ vaa naala.m upanisiiditu.m. katamehi sattahi? na manaapena paccu.t.thenti, na manaapena abhivaadenti, na manaapena aasana.m denti, santamassa pariguhanti, bahukampi thoka.m denti, pa.niitampi luukha.m denti, asakkacca.m denti no sakkacca.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi a"ngehi samannaagata.m kula.m anupagantvaa vaa naala.m upagantu.m, upagantvaa vaa ^a^T4.0010^ea^ naala.m upanisiiditu.m.

[03] ``sattahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagata.m kula.m anupagantvaa vaa ala.m upagantu.m, upagantvaa vaa ala.m upanisiiditu.m. katamehi sattahi? manaapena paccu.t.thenti, manaapena abhivaadenti, manaapena aasana.m denti, santamassa na pariguhanti, bahukampi bahuka.m denti, pa.niitampi pa.niita.m denti, sakkacca.m denti no asakkacca.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi a"ngehi samannaagata.m kula.m anupagantvaa vaa ala.m upagantu.m, upagantvaa vaa ala.m upanisiiditu''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``sattime ^a^M2.0403^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa aahuneyyaa paahuneyyaa dakkhi.neyyaa a~njalikara.niiyaa anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katame satta? ubhatobhaagavimutto, pa~n~naavimutto, kaayasakkhii, di.t.thippatto {di.t.thappatto (ka0)}, saddhaavimutto, dhammaanusaarii, saddhaanusaarii. ime ^a^P4.0011^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, satta puggalaa aahuneyyaa paahuneyyaa dakkhi.neyyaa a~njalikara.niiyaa anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``sattime, bhikkhave, udakuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame satta? {pu0 pa0 203; kathaa0 852} idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo saki.m nimuggo nimuggova hoti; idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitvaa nimujjati; idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitvaa .thito hoti; idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitvaa vipassati viloketi; idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitvaa patarati; idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco ^a^V2.0163^ea^ puggalo ummujjitvaa patigaadhappatto hoti; idha ^a^T4.0011^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitvaa ti.n.no hoti paara"ngato {paaragato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} thale ti.t.thati braahma.no.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo saki.m nimuggo nimuggova hoti? idha bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo samannaagato hoti ekantakaa.lakehi akusalehi dhammehi. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo saki.m nimuggo nimuggova hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa nimujjati? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati saadhu saddhaa kusalesu dhammesu, saadhu hirii...pe0... saadhu ottappa.m... saadhu viiriya.m {viriya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ... saadhu pa~n~naa kusalesu dhammesuuti. tassa saa saddhaa neva ti.t.thati no va.d.dhati haayatiyeva, tassa saa hirii...pe0... tassa ta.m ottappa.m... tassa ta.m viiriya.m... tassa saa pa~n~naa neva ti.t.thati no va.d.dhati haayatiyeva. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa nimujjati.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M2.0404^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa .thito hoti? idha ^a^P4.0012^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati saadhu saddhaa kusalesu dhammesu, saadhu hirii...pe0... saadhu ottappa.m... saadhu viiriya.m... saadhu pa~n~naa kusalesu dhammesuuti. tassa saa saddhaa neva haayati no va.d.dhati .thitaa hoti. tassa saa hirii...pe0... tassa ta.m ottappa.m... tassa ta.m viiriya.m... tassa saa pa~n~naa neva haayati no va.d.dhati .thitaa hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa .thito hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa vipassati viloketi? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati saadhu saddhaa kusalesu dhammesu, saadhu hirii...pe0... saadhu ottappa.m... saadhu viiriya.m... saadhu pa~n~naa kusalesu dhammesuuti. so ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapanno ^a^T4.0012^ea^ hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa vipassati viloketi.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa patarati? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati ^a^V2.0164^ea^ saadhu saddhaa kusalesu dhammesu, saadhu hirii...pe0... saadhu ottappa.m... saadhu viiriya.m... saadhu pa~n~naa kusalesu dhammesuuti. so ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamii hoti, sakideva {saki.mdeva (ka0)} ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karoti {dukkhassantakaro hoti (ka0)}. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa patarati.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa patigaadhappatto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati saadhu saddhaa kusalesu dhammesu, saadhu hirii...pe0... saadhu ottappa.m... saadhu viiriya.m... saadhu pa~n~naa kusalesu dhammesuuti. so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa patigaadhappatto hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa ti.n.no hoti paara"ngato thale ti.t.thati braahma.no. idha ^a^P4.0013^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati saadhu saddhaa kusalesu dhammesu, saadhu hirii...pe0... saadhu ottappa.m... saadhu viiriya.m... saadhu pa~n~naa ^a^M2.0405^ea^ kusalesu dhammesuuti. so aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvaa ti.n.no hoti paara"ngato thale ti.t.thati braahma.no.
[03] ``ime kho, bhikkhave, satta udakuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``sattime ^a^T4.0013^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa aahuneyyaa paahuneyyaa dakkhi.neyyaa a~njalikara.niiyaa anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katame satta? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassii viharati, aniccasa~n~nii, aniccapa.tisa.mvedii satata.m samita.m abboki.n.na.m cetasaa adhimuccamaano pa~n~naaya pariyogaahamaano. so aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa ^a^V2.0165^ea^ upasampajja viharati. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo puggalo aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassii viharati, aniccasa~n~nii, aniccapa.tisa.mvedii satata.m samita.m abboki.n.na.m cetasaa adhimuccamaano pa~n~naaya pariyogaahamaano. tassa apubba.m acarima.m aasavapariyaadaana~nca hoti jiivitapariyaadaana~nca. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo puggalo aahuneyyo...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassii viharati, aniccasa~n~nii, aniccapa.tisa.mvedii satata.m samita.m abboki.n.na.m cetasaa adhimuccamaano pa~n~naaya pariyogaahamaano. so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m ^a^P4.0014^ea^ sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti...pe0... upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti...pe0... asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti...pe0... sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti...pe0... uddha.msoto hoti akani.t.thagaamii. aya.m, bhikkhave, sattamo puggalo aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. ime kho, bhikkhave, satta puggalaa aahuneyyaa ^a^T4.0014^ea^ paahuneyyaa dakkhi.neyyaa a~njalikara.niiyaa anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ sattime ^a^M2.0406^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa aahuneyyaa...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katame satta? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbasa"nkhaaresu dukkhaanupassii viharati...pe0.... sattama.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo nibbaane sukhaanupassii viharati sukhasa~n~nii sukhapa.tisa.mvedii satata.m samita.m abboki.n.na.m cetasaa adhimuccamaano pa~n~naaya pariyogaahamaano. tassa apubba.m acarima.m aasavapariyaadaana~nca hoti jiivitapariyaadaana~nca. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo puggalo aahuneyyo...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0168^ea^ ^a^P4.0016^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati saarandade cetiye. atha kho sambahulaa licchavii yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te licchavii ^a^T4.0016^ea^ bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``satta vo, licchavii, aparihaaniye {aparihaaniiye (ka0)} dhamme desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te licchavii bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katame ^a^M2.0408^ea^ ca, licchavii, satta aparihaaniyaa dhammaa? yaavakiiva~nca, licchavii, vajjii abhi.nha.m sannipaataa bhavissanti sannipaatabahulaa; vuddhiyeva, licchavii, vajjiina.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.
[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, licchavii, vajjii samaggaa sannipatissanti, samaggaa vu.t.thahissanti, samaggaa vajjikara.niiyaani karissanti; vuddhiyeva, licchavii, vajjiina.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, licchavii, vajjii apa~n~natta.m na pa~n~naapessanti, pa~n~natta.m na samucchindissanti, yathaapa~n~natte poraa.ne vajjidhamme samaadaaya vattissanti; vuddhiyeva, licchavii, vajjiina.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, licchavii, vajjii ye te vajjiina.m vajjimahallakaa te sakkarissanti garu.m karissanti maanessanti puujessanti, tesa~nca sotabba.m ma~n~nissanti; vuddhiyeva, licchavii, vajjiina.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.
[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca ^a^V2.0169^ea^, licchavii, vajjii yaa taa kulitthiyo kulakumaariyo taa na okassa pasayha vaasessanti; vuddhiyeva, licchavii, vajjiina.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, licchavii, vajjii yaani taani vajjiina.m vajjicetiyaani abbhantaraani ceva baahiraani ca taani sakkarissanti garu.m karissanti maanessanti ^a^P4.0017^ea^ puujessanti, tesa~nca dinnapubba.m katapubba.m dhammika.m bali.m no parihaapessanti; vuddhiyeva, licchavii, vajjiina.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, licchavii, vajjiina.m arahantesu dhammikaa ^a^T4.0017^ea^ rakkhaavara.nagutti susa.mvihitaa bhavissati -- `kinti anaagataa ca arahanto vijita.m aagaccheyyu.m, aagataa ca arahanto vijite phaasu.m vihareyyu'nti; vuddhiyeva, licchavii, vajjiina.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, licchavii, ime satta aparihaaniyaa dhammaa vajjiisu .thassanti {vattissanti (ka0)}, imesu ca sattasu aparihaaniyesu dhammesu vajjii sandississanti {sandissanti (sii0 pii0 ka0)}; vuddhiyeva, licchavii, vajjiina.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaanii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M2.0409^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tena kho pana samayena raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto vajjii abhiyaatukaamo hoti. so evamaaha -- ``aha.m hime vajjii eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave ucchecchaami {ucchejjissaami (syaa0), ucchijjissaami (ka0)}, vajjii vinaasessaami, vajjii anayabyasana.m aapaadessaamii''ti {aapaadessaami vajjiiti (ka0) dii0 ni0 2.131}.

[03] atha kho raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto vassakaara.m braahma.na.m maagadhamahaamatta.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, braahma.na, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandaahi, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha -- `raajaa, bhante, maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `raajaa, bhante, maagadho ajaatasattu ^a^V2.0170^ea^ vedehiputto vajjii abhiyaatukaamo. so evamaaha -- `aha.m hime vajjii eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave ucchecchaami, vajjii vinaasessaami, vajjii anayabyasana.m aapaadessaamii'ti ^a^P4.0018^ea^. yathaa ^a^T4.0018^ea^ te bhagavaa byaakaroti, ta.m saadhuka.m uggahetvaa mama aaroceyyaasi. na hi tathaagataa vitatha.m bha.nantii''ti.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``satta vo, bhikkhave, aparihaaniye dhamme desessaami. ta.m su.naatha ^a^V2.0173^ea^, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, satta aparihaaniyaa dhammaa? yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu ^a^T4.0022^ea^ abhi.nha.m sannipaataa bhavissanti sannipaatabahulaa; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu samaggaa sannipatissanti, samaggaa vu.t.thahissanti, samaggaa sa"nghakara.niiyaani karissanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu apa~n~natta.m na pa~n~naapessanti, pa~n~natta.m na samucchindissanti, yathaapa~n~nattesu sikkhaapadesu samaadaaya vattissanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu ye te bhikkhuu theraa ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajitaa sa"nghapitaro sa"nghapari.naayakaa te sakkarissanti garu.m karissanti maanessanti puujessanti, tesa~nca sotabba.m ma~n~nissanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.
[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca ^a^M2.0413^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu uppannaaya ta.nhaaya ponobhavikaaya na vasa.m gacchissanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.
[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu aara~n~nakesu senaasanesu saapekkhaa bhavissanti ^a^P4.0022^ea^; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``sattime, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame satta? na ^a^P4.0025^ea^ kammaaraamataa, na bhassaaraamataa, na niddaaraamataa, na sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, indriyesu guttadvaarataa, bhojane matta~n~nutaa, santi kho pana sa"nghe sa"nghakara.niiyaani; tatra sekho bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `santi kho pana sa"nghe theraa ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajitaa bhaaravaahino, te tena pa~n~naayissantii'ti attanaa na tesu yoga.m aapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, satta dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ``sattime ^a^M2.0416^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa upaasakassa parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti ^a^T4.0026^ea^. katame satta? bhikkhudassana.m haapeti, saddhammassavana.m pamajjati, adhisiile na sikkhati, appasaadabahulo hoti ^a^V2.0177^ea^, bhikkhuusu theresu ceva navesu ca majjhimesu ca upaarambhacitto dhamma.m su.naati randhagavesii, ito bahiddhaa dakkhi.neyya.m gavesati, tattha ca pubbakaara.m karoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, satta dhammaa upaasakassa parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``imassa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. idha, bhante, bhikkhu attanaa ca satthugaaravo hoti, satthugaaravataaya ca va.n.navaadii. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu na satthugaaravaa te ca satthugaaravataaya samaadapeti. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu satthugaaravaa tesa~nca va.n.na.m bha.nati bhuuta.m taccha.m kaalena. attanaa ca dhammagaaravo hoti...pe0... sa"nghagaaravo hoti... sikkhaagaaravo hoti... samaadhigaaravo hoti... suvaco hoti... kalyaa.namitto hoti, kalyaa.namittataaya ca ^a^T4.0032^ea^ va.n.navaadii. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu na kalyaa.namittaa te ca kalyaa.namittataaya samaadapeti ^a^M2.0421^ea^. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu kalyaa.namittaa tesa~nca va.n.na.m bha.nati bhuuta.m taccha.m kaalenaati. imassa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaamii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! saadhu kho tva.m, saariputta, imassa mayaa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaasi. idha, saariputta, bhikkhu attanaa ca satthugaaravo hoti, satthugaaravataaya ca va.n.navaadii. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu na satthugaaravaa te ca satthugaaravataaya samaadapeti ^a^V2.0183^ea^ ^a^P4.0031^ea^. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu satthugaaravaa tesa~nca va.n.na.m bha.nati bhuuta.m taccha.m kaalena. attanaa ca dhammagaaravo hoti...pe0... sa"nghagaaravo hoti... sikkhaagaaravo hoti... samaadhigaaravo hoti... suvaco hoti... kalyaa.namitto hoti, kalyaa.namittataaya ca va.n.navaadii. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu na kalyaa.namittaa te ca kalyaa.namittataaya samaadapeti. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu kalyaa.namittaa tesa~nca va.n.na.m bha.nati bhuuta.m taccha.m kaalenaati. imassa kho, saariputta, mayaa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attho da.t.thabbo''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ``sattahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato mitto sevitabbo. katamehi sattahi? duddada.m dadaati, dukkara.m karoti, dukkhama.m khamati, guyhamassa {guyhassa (ka0)} aavi karoti, guyhamassa {guyha.m assa (sii0), guyhassa (ka0)} pariguhati {pariguuhati (sii0 syaa0), pariguyhati (ka0)}, aapadaasu na jahati, khii.nena {khii.ne (ka0)} naatima~n~nati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi a"ngehi samannaagato mitto sevitabbo''ti ^a^T4.0033^ea^.
[21] ``duddada.m dadaati mitto, dukkara~ncaapi kubbati.
[22] athopissa duruttaani, khamati dukkhamaani ca {dukkhamaanipi (sii0 syaa0)}..
[21] ``guyha~nca tassa {guyhamassa ca (syaa0)} akkhaati, guyhassa pariguuhati.
[22] aapadaasu na jahaati, khii.nena naatima~n~nati..
[21] ``yamhi etaani .thaanaani, sa.mvijjantiidha {sa.mvijjanti ca (ka0)} puggale.
[22] so mitto mittakaamena, bhajitabbo tathaavidho''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ``sattahi ^a^M2.0422^ea^ ^a^P4.0032^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu mitto sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo api panujjamaanenapi {pa.nujjamaanenapi (sii0)}. katamehi sattahi? piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca vattaa ca vacanakkhamo ca gambhiira~nca katha.m kattaa hoti, no ca a.t.thaane niyojeti ^a^V2.0184^ea^. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu mitto sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo api panujjamaanenapii''ti.
[21] ``piyo garu bhaavaniiyo, vattaa ca vacanakkhamo.
[22] gambhiira~nca katha.m kattaa, no ca.t.thaane niyojako {niyojaye (sii0 syaa0)}..
[21] ``yamhi etaani .thaanaani, sa.mvijjantiidha puggale.
[27] so mitto mittakaamena, atthakaamaanukampato.
[22] api naasiyamaanena, bhajitabbo tathaavidho''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ``sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu nacirasseva catasso ^a^T4.0034^ea^ pa.tisambhidaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya. katamehi sattahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m me cetaso liinatta'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m `ajjhatta.m me sa.mkhitta.m citta'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; bahiddhaa vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m `bahiddhaa me vikkhitta.m citta'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; tassa viditaa vedanaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti; viditaa sa~n~naa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa ^a^P4.0033^ea^ abbhattha.m gacchanti; viditaa vitakkaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti; sappaayaasappaayesu kho panassa dhammesu hiinappa.niitesu ka.nhasukkasappatibhaagesu nimitta.m suggahita.m hoti sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu nacirasseva catasso pa.tisambhidaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ``sattahi ^a^M2.0423^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato saariputto catasso pa.tisambhidaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. katamehi sattahi? idha, bhikkhave, saariputto `ida.m ^a^V2.0185^ea^ me cetaso liinatta'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m `ajjhatta.m me sa.mkhitta.m citta'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; bahiddhaa vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m `bahiddhaa me vikkhitta.m citta'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; tassa viditaa vedanaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti; viditaa ^a^T4.0035^ea^ sa~n~naa...pe0... vitakkaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti; sappaayaasappaayesu kho panassa dhammesu hiinappa.niitesu ka.nhasukkasappatibhaagesu nimitta.m suggahita.m sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannaagato saariputto catasso pa.tisambhidaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ``sattahi ^a^P4.0034^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu citta.m vase {vasa.m (ka0)} vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati. katamehi sattahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samaadhikusalo hoti, samaadhissa samaapattikusalo hoti, samaadhissa .thitikusalo hoti, samaadhissa vu.t.thaanakusalo hoti, samaadhissa kalyaa.nakusalo hoti, samaadhissa gocarakusalo hoti, samaadhissa abhiniihaarakusalo hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu citta.m vase vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattatii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ``sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato saariputto citta.m vase vatteti, no ca saariputto cittassa vasena vattati. katamehi sattahi? idha, bhikkhave, saariputto samaadhikusalo hoti, samaadhissa samaapattikusalo, samaadhissa .thitikusalo, samaadhissa vu.t.thaanakusalo, samaadhissa kalyaa.nakusalo, samaadhissa gocarakusalo, samaadhissa ^a^M2.0424^ea^ abhiniihaarakusalo hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave ^a^T4.0036^ea^, sattahi dhammehi samannaagato saariputto citta.m vase vatteti, no ca saariputto cittassa vasena vattatii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0186^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa ^a^P4.0035^ea^ etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. tena kho pana samayena tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- ``yo hi koci, aavuso, dvaadasavassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, `niddaso bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa saariputto tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva abhinandi nappa.tikkosi. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami -- ``bhagavato santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaaha.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m ^a^T4.0037^ea^ nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `atippago kho taava saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyya'nti. atha khvaaha.m, bhante, yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodi.m. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.m. tena kho pana, bhante, samayena tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ^a^P4.0036^ea^ ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi ^a^M2.0425^ea^ -- `yo hi koci, aavuso, dvaadasavassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, niddaso bhikkhuuti ala.m vacanaayaa'ti. atha khvaaha.m, bhante, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva abhinandi.m nappa.tikkosi.m. anabhinanditvaa ^a^V2.0187^ea^ appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.m {pakkaami.m (sii0 syaa0)} -- `bhagavato santike etassa attha.m aajaanissaamii'ti. sakkaa nu kho, bhante, imasmi.m dhammavinaye kevala.m vassaga.nanamattena niddaso bhikkhu pa~n~naapetu''nti?

[03] ``na kho, saariputta, sakkaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye kevala.m vassaga.nanamattena niddaso bhikkhu pa~n~naapetu.m. satta kho imaani, saariputta, niddasavatthuuni mayaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa paveditaani.

[03] {a0 ni0 7.20; dii0 ni0 3.331} ``katamaani satta? idha, saariputta, bhikkhu sikkhaasamaadaane tibbacchando hoti aayati~nca sikkhaasamaadaane avigatapemo, dhammanisantiyaa tibbacchando hoti aayati~nca dhammanisantiyaa ^a^T4.0038^ea^ avigatapemo, icchaavinaye tibbacchando hoti aayati~nca icchaavinaye avigatapemo, pa.tisallaane tibbacchando hoti aayati~nca pa.tisallaane avigatapemo, viiriyaarambhe tibbacchando hoti aayati~nca viiriyaarambhe avigatapemo, satinepakke tibbacchando hoti aayati~nca satinepakke avigatapemo, di.t.thipa.tivedhe tibbacchando hoti aayati~nca di.t.thipa.tivedhe avigatapemo. imaani kho, saariputta, satta niddasavatthuuni mayaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa paveditaani. imehi kho, saariputta, sattahi niddasavatthuuhi samannaagato bhikkhu dvaadasa cepi vassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, `niddaso bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya; catubbiisati cepi vassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, `niddaso bhikkhuu'ti ala.m ^a^P4.0037^ea^ vacanaaya; chatti.msati cepi vassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, `niddaso bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya, a.t.thacattaariisa.m cepi vassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, `niddaso bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya ^a^M2.0426^ea^ kosambi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava kosambiya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyya''nti. atha ^a^V2.0188^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkami ^a^T4.0039^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] tena kho pana samayena tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- ``yo hi koci, aavuso, dvaadasa vassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, `niddaso bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva abhinandi nappa.tikkosi. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami -- ``bhagavato santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando kosambiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m ^a^P4.0038^ea^ etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaaha.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya kosambi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `atippago kho taava kosambiya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyya'nti...pe0... tehi saddhi.m sammodi.m. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.m.

[03] ``tena kho pana, bhante, samayena tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m ^a^T4.0040^ea^ sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- `yo hi koci, aavuso, dvaadasavassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, niddaso bhikkhuuti ala.m vacanaayaa'ti. atha khvaaha.m, bhante, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva abhinandi.m nappa.tikkosi.m. anabhinanditvaa, appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.m -- `bhagavato santike etassa bhaasitassa ^a^M2.0427^ea^ attha.m aajaanissaamii'ti. sakkaa nu kho, bhante, imasmi.m dhammavinaye kevala.m vassaga.nanamattena niddaso bhikkhu pa~n~naapetu''nti?

[03] ``na ^a^V2.0189^ea^ kho, aananda, sakkaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye kevala.m vassaga.nanamattena niddaso bhikkhu pa~n~naapetu.m. satta kho imaani, aananda, niddasavatthuuni mayaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa paveditaani.

[03] ``katamaani satta? idhaananda, bhikkhu, saddho hoti, hiriimaa hoti, ottappii hoti, bahussuto hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, satimaa hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti. imaani kho, aananda, satta niddasavatthuuni mayaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa paveditaani. imehi ^a^P4.0039^ea^ kho, aananda, sattahi niddasavatthuuhi samannaagato bhikkhu dvaadasa cepi vassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, `niddaso bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya; catubbiisati cepi vassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, `niddaso bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya; chatti.msati cepi vassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, `niddaso bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya, a.t.thacattaariisa.m cepi vassaani paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, `niddaso ^a^T4.0041^ea^ bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti. dvaadasama.m.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ {dii0 ni0 3.332; cuu.lani0 posaalamaa.navapucchaaniddesa 83} ``sattimaa ^a^V2.0190^ea^, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyo. katamaa satta? santi, bhikkhave, sattaa naanattakaayaa naanattasa~n~nino, seyyathaapi manussaa, ekacce ca devaa, ekacce ca vinipaatikaa. aya.m pa.thamaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.
[03] ``santi ^a^P4.0040^ea^, bhikkhave, sattaa naanattakaayaa ekattasa~n~nino, seyyathaapi devaa brahmakaayikaa pa.thamaabhinibbattaa. aya.m dutiyaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.
[03] ``santi ^a^M2.0428^ea^, bhikkhave, sattaa ekattakaayaa naanattasa~n~nino, seyyathaapi devaa aabhassaraa. aya.m tatiyaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.
[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, sattaa ekattakaayaa ekattasa~n~nino, seyyathaapi devaa subhaki.nhaa. aya.m catutthaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.

[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, sattaa sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatanuupagaa. aya.m pa~ncamaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.
[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, sattaa sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanuupagaa ^a^T4.0042^ea^. aya.m cha.t.thaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.

[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, sattaa sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupagaa ^a^V2.0191^ea^. aya.m sattamaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti. imaa kho, bhikkhave, satta vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyo''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ``sattime, bhikkhave, samaadhiparikkhaaraa. katame satta? sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati. yaa kho, bhikkhave, imehi sattaha"ngehi cittassekaggataa parikkhataa {`saparikkhaarataa'tipi, `saparikkhataa'tipi (sa.m0 ni0 5.28)}, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo sammaasamaadhi {samaadhi (syaa0)} saupaniso itipi saparikkhaaro itipii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ ``sattime ^a^P4.0041^ea^, bhikkhave, aggii. katame satta? raagaggi, dosaggi, mohaggi, aahuneyyaggi, gahapataggi, dakkhi.neyyaggi, ka.t.thaggi -- ime kho, bhikkhave, satta aggii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena uggatasariirassa braahma.nassa mahaaya~n~no upakkha.to hoti. pa~nca usabhasataani thuu.nuupaniitaani honti ya~n~natthaaya ^a^M2.0429^ea^, pa~nca vacchatarasataani thuu.nuupaniitaani honti ya~n~natthaaya, pa~nca vacchatarisataani thuu.nuupaniitaani honti ya~n~natthaaya, pa~nca ajasataani thuu.nuupaniitaani honti ya~n~natthaaya, pa~nca urabbhasataani thuu.nuupaniitaani honti ya~n~natthaaya. atha kho uggatasariiro braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa ^a^T4.0043^ea^ saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho uggatasariiro braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``suta.m meta.m, bho gotama, aggissa aadaana.m {aadhaana.m (sii0 syaa0)} yuupassa ussaapana.m mahapphala.m hoti mahaanisa.msa''nti. ``mayaapi kho eta.m, braahma.na, suta.m aggissa aadaana.m yuupassa ussaapana.m mahapphala.m ^a^V2.0192^ea^ hoti mahaanisa.msa''nti. dutiyampi kho uggatasariiro braahma.no...pe0... tatiyampi kho uggatasariiro braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bho gotama, aggissa aadaana.m yuupassa ussaapana.m mahapphala.m hoti mahaanisa.msa''nti. ``mayaapi kho eta.m, braahma.na, suta.m aggissa aadaana.m yuupassa ussaapana.m mahapphala.m hoti mahaanisa.msa''nti. ``tayida.m, bho gotama ^a^P4.0042^ea^, sameti bhoto ceva gotamassa amhaaka~nca, yadida.m sabbena sabba.m''.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa aanando uggatasariira.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``na kho, braahma.na, tathaagataa eva.m pucchitabbaa -- `suta.m meta.m, bho gotama, aggissa aadaana.m yuupassa ussaapana.m mahapphala.m hoti mahaanisa.msa'nti. eva.m kho, braahma.na, tathaagataa pucchitabbaa -- `aha~nhi, bhante, aggi.m {aggissa (ka0)} aadaatukaamo, {aadhaatukaamo (sii0 syaa0)} yuupa.m ussaapetukaamo. ovadatu ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa. anusaasatu ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa'''ti.

[03] atha kho uggatasariiro braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha~nhi, bho gotama, aggi.m aadaatukaamo yuupa.m ussaapetukaamo. ovadatu ma.m bhava.m gotamo. anusaasatu ma.m bhava.m gotamo ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.

[03] ``aggi.m, braahma.na, aadento {aadhento (sii0 syaa0)} yuupa.m ^a^T4.0044^ea^ ussaapento pubbeva ya~n~naa tii.ni satthaani ussaapeti akusalaani dukkhudrayaani {dukkhuddayaani (sii0)} dukkhavipaakaani. katamaani tii.ni ^a^M2.0430^ea^? kaayasattha.m, vaciisattha.m, manosattha.m. aggi.m, braahma.na, aadento yuupa.m ussaapento pubbeva ya~n~naa eva.m citta.m uppaadesi -- `ettakaa usabhaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa vacchataraa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa vacchatariyo ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa ajaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa urabbhaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaayaa'ti. so `pu~n~na.m karomii'ti apu~n~na.m karoti, `kusala.m karomii'ti akusala.m karoti, `sugatiyaa magga.m pariyesaamii'ti duggatiyaa magga.m pariyesati. aggi.m, braahma.na, aadento yuupa.m ussaapento ^a^P4.0043^ea^ pubbeva ya~n~naa ida.m pa.thama.m manosattha.m ussaapeti akusala.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, aggi.m aadento yuupa.m ussaapento pubbeva ya~n~naa eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- `ettakaa usabhaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa ^a^V2.0193^ea^ vacchataraa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa vacchatariyo ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa ajaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa urabbhaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaayaa'ti. so `pu~n~na.m karomii'ti apu~n~na.m karoti, `kusala.m karomii'ti akusala.m karoti, `sugatiyaa magga.m pariyesaamii'ti duggatiyaa magga.m pariyesati. aggi.m, braahma.na, aadento yuupa.m ussaapento pubbeva ya~n~naa ida.m dutiya.m vaciisattha.m ussaapeti akusala.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, aggi.m aadento yuupa.m ussaapento pubbeva ya~n~naa saya.m pa.thama.m samaarambhati {samaarabbhati (sii0 ka0), samaarabhati (syaa0)} usabhaa ^a^T4.0045^ea^ hantu.m {ha~n~nantu (sii0 syaa0)} ya~n~natthaaya, saya.m pa.thama.m samaarambhati vacchataraa hantu.m ya~n~natthaaya, saya.m pa.thama.m samaarambhati vacchatariyo hantu.m ya~n~natthaaya, saya.m pa.thama.m samaarambhati ajaa hantu.m ya~n~natthaaya, saya.m pa.thama.m samaarambhati urabbhaa hantu.m ya~n~natthaaya {ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaayaati (sii0 syaa0)}. so `pu~n~na.m karomii'ti apu~n~na.m karoti, `kusala.m karomii'ti akusala.m karoti, `sugatiyaa magga.m pariyesaamii'ti duggatiyaa magga.m pariyesati. aggi.m, braahma.na, aadento yuupa.m ussaapento pubbeva ya~n~naa ida.m tatiya.m kaayasattha.m ussaapeti akusala.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka.m. aggi.m, braahma.na, aadento yuupa.m ussaapento pubbeva ya~n~naa imaani tii.ni satthaani ussaapeti akusalaani dukkhudrayaani dukkhavipaakaani.
[03] ``tayome ^a^M2.0431^ea^, braahma.na, aggii pahaatabbaa parivajjetabbaa, na sevitabbaa. katame tayo? raagaggi ^a^P4.0044^ea^, dosaggi, mohaggi.

[03] ``kasmaa caaya.m, braahma.na, raagaggi pahaatabbo parivajjetabbo, na sevitabbo? ratto kho, braahma.na, raagena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. tasmaaya.m raagaggi pahaatabbo parivajjetabbo, na sevitabbo.

[03] ``kasmaa caaya.m, braahma.na, dosaggi pahaatabbo parivajjetabbo, na sevitabbo? du.t.tho kho, braahma.na, dosena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m ^a^T4.0046^ea^ carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa ^a^V2.0194^ea^ duccarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. tasmaaya.m dosaggi pahaatabbo parivajjetabbo, na sevitabbo.

[03] ``kasmaa caaya.m, braahma.na, mohaggi pahaatabbo parivajjetabbo, na sevitabbo? muu.lho kho, braahma.na, mohena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. tasmaaya.m mohaggi pahaatabbo parivajjetabbo, na sevitabbo. ime kho tayo, braahma.na, aggii pahaatabbaa parivajjetabbaa, na sevitabbaa.
[03] ``tayo kho, braahma.na, aggii sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa maanetvaa puujetvaa sammaa sukha.m parihaatabbaa. katame tayo? aahuneyyaggi ^a^P4.0045^ea^, gahapataggi, dakkhi.neyyaggi.

[03] ``katamo ca, braahma.na, aahuneyyaggi? idha, braahma.na, yassa te honti maataati vaa pitaati vaa, aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, aahuneyyaggi. ta.m kissa hetu ^a^M2.0432^ea^? atohaya.m {itopaaya.m (ka0)}, braahma.na, aahuto sambhuuto, tasmaaya.m aahuneyyaggi sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa maanetvaa puujetvaa sammaa sukha.m parihaatabbo.

[03] ``katamo ca, braahma.na, gahapataggi? idha, braahma.na, yassa te honti puttaati vaa daaraati vaa daasaati vaa pessaati vaa kammakaraati vaa, aya.m vuccati, braahma.na ^a^T4.0047^ea^, gahapataggi. tasmaaya.m gahapataggi sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa maanetvaa puujetvaa sammaa sukha.m parihaatabbo.

[03] ``katamo ca, braahma.na, dakkhi.neyyaggi? idha, braahma.na, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa parappavaadaa pa.tivirataa khantisoracce nivi.t.thaa ekamattaana.m damenti, ekamattaana.m samenti, ekamattaana.m parinibbaapenti, aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, dakkhi.neyyaggi. tasmaaya.m dakkhi.neyyaggi sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa maanetvaa puujetvaa sammaa sukha.m parihaatabbo. ime kho, braahma.na, tayo aggii sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa maanetvaa puujetvaa sammaa sukha.m parihaatabbaa.
[03] ``aya.m ^a^V2.0195^ea^ kho pana, braahma.na, ka.t.thaggi kaalena kaala.m ujjaletabbo, kaalena kaala.m ajjhupekkhitabbo, kaalena kaala.m nibbaapetabbo, kaalena kaala.m nikkhipitabbo''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte uggatasariiro braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama; abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m ^a^P4.0046^ea^ sara.na.m gatanti. esaaha.m, bho gotama, pa~nca usabhasataani mu~ncaami jiivita.m demi, pa~nca vacchatarasataani mu~ncaami jiivita.m demi, pa~nca vacchatarisataani mu~ncaami jiivita.m demi, pa~nca ajasataani mu~ncaami jiivita.m demi, pa~nca urabbhasataani mu~ncaami jiivita.m demi. haritaani ceva ti.naani khaadantu, siitaani ca paaniiyaani pivantu, siito ca nesa.m vaato upavaayata''nti {upavaayatuuti (ka0)}. catuttha.m.
[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ``sattimaa, bhikkhave, sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^M2.0433^ea^ satta? asubhasa~n~naa ^a^T4.0048^ea^, mara.nasa~n~naa, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa, aniccasa~n~naa, anicce dukkhasa~n~naa, dukkhe anattasa~n~naa. imaa kho, bhikkhave, satta sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ ``sattimaa, bhikkhave, sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa. katamaa satta? asubhasa~n~naa, mara.nasa~n~naa, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa, aniccasa~n~naa, anicce dukkhasa~n~naa, dukkhe anattasa~n~naa. imaa kho, bhikkhave, satta sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaati.

[03] ```asubhasa~n~naa ^a^V2.0196^ea^, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti. iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? asubhasa~n~naaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasaa bahula.m viharato methunadhammasamaapattiyaa citta.m patiliiyati ^a^P4.0047^ea^ patiku.tati pativattati, na sampasaariyati upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kukku.tapatta.m vaa nhaarudaddula.m vaa aggimhi pakkhitta.m patiliiyati patiku.tati pativattati, na sampasaariyati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asubhasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato methunadhammasamaapattiyaa citta.m patiliiyati patiku.tati pativattati, na sampasaariyati upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asubhasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato methunadhammasamaapattiyaa citta.m anusandahati {anusa.n.thaati (sii0)} appa.tikulyataa ^a^T4.0049^ea^ sa.n.thaati; veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `abhaavitaa me asubhasa~n~naa, natthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, appatta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asubhasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato methunadhammasamaapattiyaa citta.m patiliiyati patiku.tati pativattati, na sampasaariyati upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati; veditabbameta.m ^a^M2.0434^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `subhaavitaa me asubhasa~n~naa, atthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, patta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. `asubhasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```mara.nasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa ^a^P4.0048^ea^ hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? mara.nasa~n~naaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasaa bahula.m viharato jiivitanikantiyaa citta.m patiliiyati patiku.tati pativattati, na sampasaariyati upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kukku.tapatta.m vaa nhaarudaddula.m vaa aggimhi pakkhitta.m patiliiyati patiku.tati pativattati, na sampasaariyati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mara.nasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato jiivitanikantiyaa citta.m patiliiyati patiku.tati pativattati, na sampasaariyati upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati.

[03] ``sace ^a^V2.0197^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mara.nasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato jiivitanikantiyaa ^a^T4.0050^ea^ citta.m anusandahati appa.tikulyataa sa.n.thaati; veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `abhaavitaa me mara.nasa~n~naa, natthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, appatta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mara.nasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato jiivitanikantiyaa citta.m patiliiyati patiku.tati pativattati, na sampasaariyati upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati; veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `subhaavitaa me mara.nasa~n~naa, atthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, patta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. `mara.nasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti ^a^P4.0049^ea^ mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasaa bahula.m viharato rasata.nhaaya citta.m patiliiyati ^a^M2.0435^ea^ ...pe0... upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kukku.tapatta.m vaa nhaarudaddula.m vaa aggimhi pakkhitta.m patiliiyati patiku.tati pativattati, na sampasaariyati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato rasata.nhaaya citta.m patiliiyati...pe0... upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati ^a^T4.0051^ea^.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato rasata.nhaaya citta.m anusandahati appa.tikulyataa sa.n.thaati; veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `abhaavitaa me aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, natthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, appatta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato rasata.nhaaya citta.m patiliiyati...pe0... upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati; veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `subhaavitaa me aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, atthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, patta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano ^a^V2.0198^ea^ hoti. `aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa ^a^P4.0050^ea^, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasaa bahula.m viharato lokacitresu citta.m patiliiyati...pe0... seyyathaapi bhikkhave...pe0... patiliiyati patiku.tati pativattati, na sampasaariyati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato lokacitresu ^a^T4.0052^ea^ citta.m patiliiyati patiku.tati pativattati, na sampasaariyati upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato lokacitresu citta.m anusandahati appa.tikulyataa sa.n.thaati; veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `abhaavitaa me sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa, natthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, appatta.m me ^a^M2.0436^ea^ bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ^a^P4.0051^ea^ sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato lokacitresu citta.m patiliiyati...pe0... upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati; veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `subhaavitaa me sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa, atthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, patta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. `sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```aniccasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? aniccasa~n~naaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasaa bahula.m viharato laabhasakkaarasiloke citta.m patiliiyati...pe0... upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kukku.tapatta.m vaa nhaarudaddula.m vaa aggimhi pakkhitta.m patiliiyati ^a^T4.0053^ea^ patiku.tati pativattati na sampasaariyati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aniccasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato ^a^V2.0199^ea^ laabhasakkaarasiloke citta.m patiliiyati...pe0... upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aniccasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato laabhasakkaarasiloke citta.m anusandahati appa.tikulyataa sa.n.thaati; veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `abhaavitaa me aniccasa~n~naa, natthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, appatta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aniccasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato laabhasakkaarasiloke citta.m patiliiyati patiku.tati ^a^P4.0052^ea^ pativattati, na sampasaariyati upekkhaa vaa paa.tikulyataa vaa sa.n.thaati; veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `subhaavitaa me aniccasa~n~naa, atthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, patta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. `aniccasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```anicce ^a^M2.0437^ea^ dukkhasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? anicce dukkhasa~n~naaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasaa bahula.m viharato aalasye kosajje vissa.t.thiye pamaade ananuyoge apaccavekkha.naaya tibbaa bhayasa~n~naa paccupa.t.thitaa hoti, seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ukkhittaasike ^a^T4.0054^ea^ vadhake.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno anicce dukkhasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato aalasye kosajje vissa.t.thiye pamaade ananuyoge apaccavekkha.naaya tibbaa bhayasa~n~naa, na paccupa.t.thitaa hoti, seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ukkhittaasike vadhake. veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `abhaavitaa me anicce dukkhasa~n~naa, natthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, appatta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno anicce dukkhasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato aalasye kosajje vissa.t.thiye pamaade ananuyoge apaccavekkha.naaya tibbaa bhayasa~n~naa paccupa.t.thitaa hoti, seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ukkhittaasike vadhake. veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `subhaavitaa me anicce dukkhasa~n~naa, atthi me pubbenaapara.m ^a^V2.0200^ea^ viseso, patta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. `anicce dukkhasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti ^a^P4.0053^ea^ mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```dukkhe anattasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? dukkhe anattasa~n~naaparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasaa bahula.m viharato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaapagata.m maanasa.m hoti vidhaasamatikkanta.m santa.m suvimutta.m.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dukkhe anattasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato imasmi~nca ^a^T4.0055^ea^ savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu na aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaapagata.m maanasa.m hoti vidhaasamatikkanta.m santa.m suvimutta.m. veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `abhaavitaa me dukkhe anattasa~n~naa ^a^M2.0438^ea^, natthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, appatta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti.

[03] ``sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dukkhe anattasa~n~naaparicitena cetasaa bahula.m viharato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaapagata.m maanasa.m hoti vidhaasamatikkanta.m santa.m suvimutta.m. veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa `subhaavitaa me dukkhe anattasa~n~naa, atthi me pubbenaapara.m viseso, patta.m me bhaavanaabala'nti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti. `dukkhe anattasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.
[03] ``imaa kho, bhikkhave, satta sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0201^ea^ ^a^P4.0054^ea^ kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhavampi no gotamo brahmacaarii pa.tijaanaatii''ti? ``ya~nhi ta.m, braahma.na, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `akha.n.da.m acchidda.m asabala.m akammaasa.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caratii'ti, mameva ^a^T4.0056^ea^ ta.m, braahma.na, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `aha~nhi, braahma.na, akha.n.da.m acchidda.m asabala.m akammaasa.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caraamii'''ti. ``ki.m pana, bho gotama, brahmacariyassa kha.n.dampi chiddampi sabalampi kammaasampii''ti?

[03] ``idha, braahma.na, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa sammaa brahmacaarii pa.tijaanamaano na heva kho maatugaamena saddhi.m dvaya.mdvayasamaapatti.m samaapajjati; api ca kho maatugaamassa ucchaadanaparimaddananhaapanasambaahana.m saadiyati. so ta.m assaadeti {so tadassaadeti (sii0)}, ta.m nikaameti, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati. idampi kho, braahma.na, brahmacariyassa kha.n.dampi chiddampi sabalampi kammaasampi. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, aparisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, sa.myutto methunena sa.myogena na parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena {jaraamara.nena (sii0 syaa0)} sokehi ^a^M2.0439^ea^ paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, na parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``puna ^a^P4.0055^ea^ capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa sammaa brahmacaarii pa.tijaanamaano na heva kho maatugaamena saddhi.m dvaya.mdvayasamaapatti.m samaapajjati, napi maatugaamassa ucchaadanaparimaddananhaapanasambaahana.m saadiyati; api ca kho maatugaamena saddhi.m sa~njagghati sa.mkii.lati sa.mkelaayati...pe0... napi maatugaamena saddhi.m sa~njagghati sa.mkii.lati sa.mkelaayati; api ca kho maatugaamassa cakkhunaa cakkhu.m upanijjhaayati pekkhati...pe0... napi maatugaamassa cakkhunaa cakkhu.m upanijjhaayati pekkhati; api ca kho maatugaamassa sadda.m su.naati ^a^T4.0057^ea^ tiroku.t.ta.m vaa tiropaakaara.m vaa hasantiyaa vaa bha.nantiyaa vaa gaayantiyaa vaa rodantiyaa vaa...pe0... napi maatugaamassa sadda.m su.naati tiroku.t.ta.m vaa tiropaakaara.m vaa hasantiyaa vaa bha.nantiyaa vaa gaayantiyaa vaa rodantiyaa vaa; api ca kho yaanissa taani pubbe ^a^V2.0202^ea^ maatugaamena saddhi.m hasitalapitakii.litaani taani anussarati...pe0... napi yaanissa taani pubbe maatugaamena saddhi.m hasitalapitakii.litaani taani anussarati; api ca kho passati gahapati.m vaa gahapatiputta.m vaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappita.m sama"ngiibhuuta.m paricaarayamaana.m...pe0... napi passati gahapati.m vaa gahapatiputta.m vaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappita.m sama"ngiibhuuta.m paricaarayamaana.m; api ca kho a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaati. so ta.m assaadeti, ta.m nikaameti, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati. idampi kho, braahma.na, brahmacariyassa kha.n.dampi chiddampi sabalampi kammaasampi. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, aparisuddha.m ^a^P4.0056^ea^ brahmacariya.m carati sa.myutto methunena sa.myogena, na parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, na parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m, braahma.na, imesa.m sattanna.m methunasa.myogaana.m a~n~natara~n~nataramethunasa.myoga.m {a~n~natara.m methunasa.myoga.m (sii0 syaa0)} attani appahiina.m samanupassi.m, neva taavaaha.m, braahma.na, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya anuttara.m ^a^T4.0058^ea^ sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti pacca~n~naasi.m {abhisambuddho pacca~n~naasi.m (sii0 syaa0)}.

[03] ``yato ^a^M2.0440^ea^ ca khoha.m, braahma.na, imesa.m sattanna.m methunasa.myogaana.m a~n~natara~n~nataramethunasa.myoga.m attani appahiina.m na samanupassi.m, athaaha.m, braahma.na, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti pacca~n~naasi.m. `~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi, akuppaa me vimutti {cetovimutti (sii0 ka0)}, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama; abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. sattama.m.
[03] 51^b^.^eb^ ``sa.myogavisa.myoga.m ^a^V2.0203^ea^ ^a^P4.0057^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, dhammapariyaaya.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha...pe0... katamo ca so, bhikkhave, sa.myogo visa.myogo dhammapariyaayo?

[03] ``itthii, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m itthindriya.m manasi karoti -- itthikutta.m itthaakappa.m itthividha.m itthicchanda.m itthissara.m itthaala"nkaara.m. saa tattha rajjati tatraabhiramati. saa tattha rattaa tatraabhirataa bahiddhaa purisindriya.m manasi karoti -- purisakutta.m purisaakappa.m purisavidha.m purisacchanda.m purisassara.m purisaala"nkaara.m. saa tattha rajjati tatraabhiramati. saa tattha rattaa tatraabhirataa bahiddhaa sa.myoga.m aaka"nkhati. ya~ncassaa sa.myogapaccayaa uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m ^a^T4.0059^ea^ ta~nca aaka"nkhati. itthatte, bhikkhave, abhirataa sattaa purisesu sa.myoga.m gataa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, itthii itthatta.m naativattati.

[03] ``puriso, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m purisindriya.m manasi karoti -- purisakutta.m purisaakappa.m purisavidha.m purisacchanda.m purisassara.m purisaala"nkaara.m. so tattha rajjati tatraabhiramati. so tattha ratto tatraabhirato bahiddhaa itthindriya.m manasi karoti -- itthikutta.m itthaakappa.m itthividha.m itthicchanda.m itthissara.m itthaala"nkaara.m. so tattha rajjati tatraabhiramati. so tattha ratto tatraabhirato bahiddhaa sa.myoga.m aaka"nkhati. ya~ncassa sa.myogapaccayaa uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m ta~nca aaka"nkhati. purisatte, bhikkhave, abhirataa sattaa ^a^M2.0441^ea^ itthiisu sa.myoga.m gataa. eva.m ^a^P4.0058^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, puriso purisatta.m naativattati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sa.myogo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, visa.myogo hoti? itthii, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m itthindriya.m na manasi karoti -- itthikutta.m itthaakappa.m itthividha.m itthicchanda.m itthissara.m itthaala"nkaara.m. saa tattha na rajjati, saa tatra naabhiramati. saa tattha arattaa tatra anabhirataa bahiddhaa purisindriya.m na manasi karoti -- purisakutta.m purisaakappa.m purisavidha.m purisacchanda.m purisassara.m purisaala"nkaara.m. saa tattha na rajjati, tatra naabhiramati. saa tattha arattaa tatra anabhirataa bahiddhaa sa.myoga.m naaka"nkhati. ya~ncassaa sa.myogapaccayaa uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m ta~nca naaka"nkhati. itthatte, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0204^ea^, anabhirataa sattaa purisesu visa.myoga.m gataa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, itthii itthatta.m ^a^T4.0060^ea^ ativattati.

[03] ``puriso, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m purisindriya.m na manasi karoti -- purisakutta.m purisaakappa.m purisavidha.m purisacchanda.m purisassara.m purisaala"nkaara.m. so tattha na rajjati, so tatra naabhiramati. so tattha aratto tatra anabhirato bahiddhaa itthindriya.m na manasi karoti -- itthikutta.m itthaakappa.m itthividha.m itthicchanda.m itthissara.m itthaala"nkaara.m. so tattha na rajjati, tatra naabhiramati. so tattha aratto tatra anabhirato bahiddhaa sa.myoga.m naaka"nkhati. ya~ncassa sa.myogapaccayaa uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m ta~nca naaka"nkhati. purisatte, bhikkhave, anabhirataa sattaa itthiisu visa.myoga.m gataa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puriso purisatta.m ativattati. eva.m ^a^P4.0059^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, visa.myogo hoti. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, sa.myogo visa.myogo dhammapariyaayo''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa campaaya.m viharati gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire. atha kho sambahulaa campeyyakaa upaasakaa yena aayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho campeyyakaa upaasakaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``cirassutaa no, bhante {bhante saariputta (sii0)}, bhagavato ^a^M2.0442^ea^ sammukhaa dhammiikathaa. saadhu maya.m, bhante, labheyyaama bhagavato sammukhaa dhammi.m katha.m {bhagavato santikaa dhammi.m katha.m (sii0), bhagavato dhammi.m katha.m (syaa0)} savanaayaa''ti. ``tenahaavuso, tadahuposathe aagaccheyyaatha, appeva naama labheyyaatha bhagavato sammukhaa {bhagavato santike (syaa0)} dhammi.m katha.m savanaayaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho campeyyakaa upaasakaa aayasmato saariputtassa pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa ^a^T4.0061^ea^ aayasmanta.m saariputta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu.

[03] atha kho campeyyakaa upaasakaa tadahuposathe yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto tehi campeyyakehi upaasakehi saddhi.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``siyaa ^a^V2.0205^ea^ ^a^P4.0060^ea^ nu kho, bhante, idhekaccassa taadisa.myeva daana.m dinna.m na mahapphala.m hoti na mahaanisa.msa.m; siyaa pana, bhante, idhekaccassa taadisa.myeva daana.m dinna.m mahapphala.m hoti mahaanisa.msa''nti? ``siyaa, saariputta, idhekaccassa taadisa.myeva daana.m dinna.m na mahapphala.m hoti na mahaanisa.msa.m; siyaa pana, saariputta, idhekaccassa taadisa.myeva daana.m dinna.m mahapphala.m hoti mahaanisa.msa''nti. ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena midhekaccassa taadisa.myeva daana.m dinna.m na mahapphala.m hoti na mahaanisa.msa.m; ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena midhekaccassa taadisa.myeva daana.m dinna.m mahapphala.m hoti mahaanisa.msa''nti?

[03] ``idha, saariputta, ekacco saapekho {saapekkho (syaa0)} daana.m deti, patibaddhacitto {patibandhacitto (ka0)} daana.m deti, sannidhipekho daana.m deti, `ima.m pecca paribhu~njissaamii'ti daana.m deti. so ta.m daana.m deti sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa anna.m paana.m vattha.m yaana.m maalaagandhavilepana.m seyyaavasathapadiipeyya.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, saariputta, dadeyya idhekacco evaruupa.m daana''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``tatra, saariputta, yvaaya.m saapekho daana.m deti ^a^T4.0062^ea^, patibaddhacitto daana.m deti, sannidhipekho daana.m deti, `ima.m pecca paribhu~njissaamii'ti daana.m deti. so ^a^M2.0443^ea^ ta.m daana.m datvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. so ta.m kamma.m ^a^P4.0061^ea^ khepetvaa ta.m iddhi.m ta.m yasa.m ta.m aadhipacca.m aagaamii hoti aagantaa itthatta.m.

[03] ``idha pana, saariputta, ekacco na heva kho saapekho daana.m deti, na patibaddhacitto daana.m deti, na sannidhipekho daana.m deti, na `ima.m pecca paribhu~njissaamii'ti daana.m deti; api ca kho `saahu daana'nti daana.m deti...pe0... napi `saahu daana'nti daana.m deti; api ca kho `dinnapubba.m katapubba.m pitupitaamahehi na arahaami poraa.na.m kulava.msa.m haapetu'nti daana.m deti...pe0... napi `dinnapubba.m katapubba.m pitupitaamahehi na arahaami poraa.na.m kulava.msa.m haapetu'nti daana.m deti; api ca kho `aha.m pacaami, ime na pacanti, naarahaami pacanto apacantaana.m daana.m adaatu'nti daana.m deti...pe0... napi `aha.m pacaami, ime na pacanti, naarahaami pacanto apacantaana.m daana.m adaatu'nti daana.m deti; api ca kho `yathaa tesa.m pubbakaana.m isiina.m taani mahaaya~n~naani ahesu.m, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thakassa vaamakassa vaamadevassa vessaamittassa yamadaggino a"ngiirasassa bhaaradvaajassa vaase.t.thassa kassapassa bhaguno, eva.m me aya.m ^a^V2.0206^ea^ daanasa.mvibhaago bhavissatii'ti daana.m deti...pe0... napi `yathaa tesa.m pubbakaana.m isiina.m taani mahaaya~n~naani ahesu.m, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thakassa vaamakassa vaamadevassa vessaamittassa yamadaggino a"ngiirasassa bhaaradvaajassa vaase.t.thassa ^a^T4.0063^ea^ kassapassa bhaguno, eva.m me aya.m daanasa.mvibhaago ^a^P4.0062^ea^ bhavissatii'ti daana.m deti; api ca kho `ima.m me daana.m dadato citta.m pasiidati, attamanataa somanassa.m upajaayatii'ti daana.m deti...pe0... napi `ima.m me daana.m dadato citta.m pasiidati, attamanataa somanassa.m upajaayatii'ti daana.m deti; api ca kho cittaala"nkaaracittaparikkhaara.m daana.m deti. so ta.m daana.m deti sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa anna.m paana.m vattha.m yaana.m maalaagandhavilepana.m seyyaavasathapadiipeyya.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, saariputta, dadeyya idhekacco evaruupa.m daana''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``tatra, saariputta, yvaaya.m na heva {naheva kho (sii0 syaa0)} saapekho daana.m deti; na patibaddhacitto daana.m deti; na sannidhipekho daana.m deti; na `ima.m pecca paribhu~njissaamii'ti daana.m deti; napi `saahu daana'nti daana.m deti; napi `dinnapubba.m katapubba.m pitupitaamahehi ^a^M2.0444^ea^ na arahaami poraa.na.m kulava.msa.m haapetu'nti daana.m deti; napi `aha.m pacaami, ime na pacanti, naarahaami pacanto apacantaana.m daana.m adaatu'nti daana.m deti; napi `yathaa tesa.m pubbakaana.m isiina.m taani mahaaya~n~naani ahesu.m, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thakassa vaamakassa vaamadevassa vessaamittassa yamadaggino a"ngiirasassa bhaaradvaajassa vaase.t.thassa kassapassa bhaguno, eva.m me aya.m daanasa.mvibhaago bhavissatii'ti daana.m deti; napi `ima.m me daana.m dadato citta.m pasiidati, attamanataa somanassa.m upajaayatii'ti daana.m deti; api ca kho cittaala"nkaaracittaparikkhaara.m daana.m deti. so ta.m daana.m datvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa brahmakaayikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m ^a^T4.0064^ea^ upapajjati. so ta.m kamma.m ^a^P4.0063^ea^ khepetvaa ta.m iddhi.m ta.m yasa.m ta.m aadhipacca.m anaagaamii hoti anaagantaa itthatta.m. aya.m kho, saariputta, hetu aya.m paccayo yena midhekaccassa taadisa.myeva daana.m dinna.m na mahapphala.m hoti na mahaanisa.msa.m. aya.m pana, saariputta, hetu aya.m paccayo yena midhekaccassa taadisa.myeva daana.m dinna.m mahapphala.m hoti mahaanisa.msa''nti. navama.m.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano ^a^V2.0207^ea^ dakkhi.naagirismi.m caarika.m caranti mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. tena kho pana samayena ve.luka.n.dakii {ve.luka.n.dakii (syaa0) a0 ni0 6.37; 2.134; sa.m0 ni0 2.173 passitabba.m} nandamaataa upaasikaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya paaraayana.m {cuu.lani0 paaraayanavagga, vatthugaathaa} sarena bhaasati.

[03] tena kho pana samayena vessava.no mahaaraajaa uttaraaya disaaya dakkhi.na.m disa.m gacchati kenacideva kara.niiyena. assosi kho vessava.no mahaaraajaa nandamaataaya upaasikaaya paaraayana.m sarena bhaasantiyaa, sutvaa kathaapariyosaana.m aagamayamaano a.t.thaasi.

[03] atha kho nandamaataa upaasikaa paaraayana.m sarena bhaasitvaa tu.nhii ahosi. atha kho vessava.no mahaaraajaa nandamaataaya upaasikaaya kathaapariyosaana.m viditvaa abbhaanumodi -- ``saadhu bhagini, saadhu bhaginii''ti! ``ko paneso, bhadramukhaa''ti? ``aha.m te, bhagini, bhaataa vessava.no, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhadramukha, tena hi yo me aya.m dhammapariyaayo bha.nito ^a^M2.0445^ea^ ida.m te hotu aatitheyya''nti. ``saadhu, bhagini, eta~nceva me hotu ^a^P4.0064^ea^ aatitheyya.m. sveva {sve ca (sii0)} saariputtamoggallaanappamukho ^a^T4.0065^ea^ bhikkhusa"ngho akatapaataraaso ve.luka.n.daka.m aagamissati, ta~nca bhikkhusa"ngha.m parivisitvaa mama dakkhi.na.m aadiseyyaasi. eta~nceva {eva~nca (sii0 syaa0), eta~nca (?)} me bhavissati aatitheyya''nti.
