[03] atha kho nandamaataa upaasikaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapesi. atha kho saariputtamoggallaanappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho akatapaataraaso yena ve.luka.n.dako tadavasari. atha kho nandamaataa upaasikaa a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhusa"nghassa kaala.m aarocehi -- `kaalo, bhante, ayyaaya nandamaatuyaa nivesane ni.t.thita.m bhatta'''nti. ``eva.m, ayye''ti kho so puriso nandamaataaya upaasikaaya pa.tissutvaa aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhusa"nghassa kaala.m aarocesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ayyaaya nandamaatuyaa nivesane ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho saariputtamoggallaanappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena nandamaataaya upaasikaaya nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho nandamaataa upaasikaa saariputtamoggallaanappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0208^ea^ kho nandamaataa upaasikaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho nandamaatara.m upaasika.m aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca -- ``ko pana te, nandamaate, bhikkhusa"nghassa abbhaagamana.m aarocesii''ti?

[03] ``idhaaha.m, bhante ^a^T4.0066^ea^, rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya paaraayana.m sarena bhaasitvaa tu.nhii ahosi.m. atha kho, bhante, vessava.no mahaaraajaa ^a^P4.0065^ea^ mama kathaapariyosaana.m viditvaa abbhaanumodi -- `saadhu, bhagini, saadhu, bhaginii'ti! `ko paneso, bhadramukhaa'ti? `aha.m te, bhagini, bhaataa vessava.no, mahaaraajaa'ti. `saadhu, bhadramukha, tena hi yo me aya.m dhammapariyaayo ^a^M2.0446^ea^ bha.nito ida.m te hotu aatitheyya'nti. `saadhu, bhagini, eta~nceva me hotu aatitheyya.m. sveva saariputtamoggallaanappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho akatapaataraaso ve.luka.n.daka.m aagamissati, ta~nca bhikkhusa"ngha.m parivisitvaa mama dakkhi.na.m aadiseyyaasi. eta~nceva {eta~nca (sii0), eva~nca (syaa0)} me bhavissati aatitheyya'nti. yadida.m {yamida.m (ma0 ni0 1.363)}, bhante, daane {pu~n~na.m hi ta.m (sii0), pu~n~na.m pu~n~namahita.m (syaa0), pu~n~na.m vaa pu~n~namaha.m vaa (pii0), pu~n~na.m vaa pu~n~namahii vaa (ka0)} pu~n~na~nca pu~n~namahii ca ta.m {pu~n~na.m hi ta.m (sii0), pu~n~na.m pu~n~namahita.m (syaa0), pu~n~na.m vaa pu~n~namaha.m vaa (pii0), pu~n~na.m vaa pu~n~namahii vaa (ka0)} vessava.nassa mahaaraajassa sukhaaya hotuu''ti.
[03] ``acchariya.m, nandamaate, abbhuta.m, nandamaate! yatra hi naama vessava.nena mahaaraajena eva.mmahiddhikena eva.mmahesakkhena devaputtena sammukhaa sallapissasii''ti.

[03] ``na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo. atthi me a~n~nopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo. idha me, bhante, nando naama ekaputtako piyo manaapo. ta.m raajaano kismi~ncideva pakara.ne okassa pasayha jiivitaa voropesu.m. tasmi.m kho panaaha.m, bhante, daarake gahite vaa gayhamaane vaa vadhe vaa vajjhamaane vaa hate vaa ha~n~namaane vaa naabhijaanaami cittassa a~n~nathatta''nti. ``acchariya.m, nandamaate, abbhuta.m nandamaate! yatra hi naama cittuppaadampi {cittuppaadamattampi (syaa0)} parisodhessasii''ti.

[03] ``na kho me, bhante ^a^P4.0066^ea^, eseva acchariyo abbhuto ^a^T4.0067^ea^ dhammo. atthi me a~n~nopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo. idha me, bhante, saamiko kaala"nkato a~n~natara.m yakkhayoni.m upapanno. so me teneva purimena attabhaavena uddassesi. na kho panaaha.m, bhante, abhijaanaami ^a^V2.0209^ea^ tatonidaana.m cittassa a~n~nathatta''nti. ``acchariya.m, nandamaate, abbhuta.m, nandamaate! yatra hi naama cittuppaadampi parisodhessasii''ti.

[03] ``na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo. atthi me a~n~nopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo. yatoha.m, bhante, saamikassa daharasseva daharaa aaniitaa naabhijaanaami saamika.m manasaapi aticaritaa {aticaritu.m (syaa0), aticaaritta.m (ka0)}, kuto pana kaayenaa''ti! ``acchariya.m, nandamaate, abbhuta.m, nandamaate! yatra hi naama cittuppaadampi parisodhessasii''ti.

[03] ``na ^a^M2.0447^ea^ kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo. atthi me a~n~nopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo. yadaaha.m, bhante, upaasikaa pa.tidesitaa naabhijaanaami ki~nci sikkhaapada.m sa~ncicca viitikkamitaa''ti. ``acchariya.m, nandamaate, abbhuta.m, nandamaate''ti!

[03] ``na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo. atthi me a~n~nopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo. idhaaha.m, bhante, yaavadeva {yaavadeva (sii0 syaa0) sa.m0 ni0 2.152 paa.li ca a.t.thakathaa.tiikaa ca passitabbaa} aaka"nkhaami vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhikaa ca viharaami sataa ca sampajaanaa sukha~nca ^a^T4.0068^ea^ kaaye ^a^P4.0067^ea^ pa.tisa.mvedemi, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaamii''ti. ``acchariya.m, nandamaate, abbhuta.m, nandamaate''ti!

[03] ``na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo. atthi me a~n~nopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo. yaanimaani, bhante, bhagavataa desitaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani naaha.m tesa.m ki~nci attani appahiina.m samanupassaamii''ti. ``acchariya.m, nandamaate, abbhuta.m, nandamaate''ti!
[03] atha ^a^V2.0210^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto nandamaatara.m upaasika.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaamiiti. dasama.m.
[06] mahaaya~n~navaggo pa~ncamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] .thiti ca parikkhaara.m dve, aggii sa~n~naa ca dve paraa.
[22] methunaa sa.myogo daana.m, nandamaatena te dasaati..
[06] pa.thamapa.n.naasaka.m samatta.m.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T4.0069^ea^ ^a^M2.0448^ea^ ^a^V2.0211^ea^ kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m ^a^P4.0068^ea^ nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena sutavato ariyasaavakassa vicikicchaa nuppajjati abyaakatavatthuusuu''ti?

[03] ``di.t.thinirodhaa kho, bhikkhu, sutavato ariyasaavakassa vicikicchaa nuppajjati abyaakatavatthuusu. `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, bhikkhu, di.t.thigatameta.m; `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, bhikkhu, di.t.thigatameta.m; `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, bhikkhu, di.t.thigatameta.m; `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, bhikkhu, di.t.thigatameta.m. assutavaa, bhikkhu, puthujjano di.t.thi.m nappajaanaati, di.t.thisamudaya.m nappajaanaati, di.t.thinirodha.m nappajaanaati, di.t.thinirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaanaati. tassa saa di.t.thi pava.d.dhati, so na parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, na parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhu, ariyasaavako di.t.thi.m pajaanaati, di.t.thisamudaya.m pajaanaati, di.t.thinirodha.m pajaanaati, di.t.thinirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaanaati. tassa saa di.t.thi nirujjhati, so parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi ^a^T4.0070^ea^ domanassehi upaayaasehi, parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaami. eva.m jaana.m kho, bhikkhu, sutavaa ariyasaavako eva.m passa.m `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na byaakaroti; `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na byaakaroti; `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na byaakaroti; `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na byaakaroti. eva.m jaana.m kho, bhikkhu, sutavaa ariyasaavako eva.m passa.m eva.m abyaakara.nadhammo hoti abyaakatavatthuusu ^a^V2.0212^ea^. eva.m jaana.m kho, bhikkhu, sutavaa ariyasaavako eva.m passa.m na chambhati, na kampati, na vedhati, na santaasa.m aapajjati abyaakatavatthuusu.

[03] ```hoti ^a^M2.0449^ea^ tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, bhikkhu, ta.nhaagatameta.m...pe0... sa~n~naagatameta.m ^a^P4.0069^ea^...pe0... ma~n~nitameta.m...pe0... papa~ncitameta.m...pe0... upaadaanagatameta.m...pe0... `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, bhikkhu, vippa.tisaaro eso; `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, bhikkhu, vippa.tisaaro eso; `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, bhikkhu, vippa.tisaaro eso; `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, bhikkhu, vippa.tisaaro eso. assutavaa, bhikkhu, puthujjano vippa.tisaara.m nappajaanaati, vippa.tisaarasamudaya.m nappajaanaati, vippa.tisaaranirodha.m nappajaanaati, vippa.tisaaranirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaanaati. tassa so vippa.tisaaro pava.d.dhati, so na parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, na parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[01] ``sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhu, ariyasaavako vippa.tisaara.m pajaanaati, vippa.tisaarasamudaya.m pajaanaati, vippa.tisaaranirodha.m pajaanaati ^a^T4.0071^ea^, vippa.tisaaranirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaanaati. tassa so vippa.tisaaro nirujjhati, so parimuccati jaatiyaa...pe0... dukkhasmaati vadaami. eva.m jaana.m kho, bhikkhu, sutavaa ariyasaavako eva.m passa.m `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na byaakaroti...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na byaakaroti. eva.m jaana.m kho, bhikkhu, sutavaa ariyasaavako eva.m passa.m eva.m abyaakara.nadhammo hoti abyaakatavatthuusu. eva.m jaana.m kho, bhikkhu, sutavaa ariyasaavako eva.m passa.m na chambhati, na kampati, na vedhati, na santaasa.m aapajjati abyaakatavatthuusu. aya.m ^a^P4.0070^ea^ kho, bhikkhu, hetu aya.m paccayo yena sutavato ariyasaavakassa vicikicchaa nuppajjati abyaakatavatthuusuu''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ ``satta ca {satta (sii0), satta ca kho (ka0)}, bhikkhave, purisagatiyo desessaami anupaadaa ca parinibbaana.m {parinibbaa.na.m (sii0)}. ta.m su.naatha ^a^V2.0213^ea^, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, satta purisagatiyo?

[03] ``idha ^a^M2.0450^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- `no cassa no ca me siyaa, na bhavissati na me bhavissati, yadatthi ya.m bhuuta.m ta.m pajahaamii'ti upekkha.m pa.tilabhati. so bhave na rajjati, sambhave na rajjati, atthuttari pada.m santa.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. ta~nca khvassa pada.m na sabbena sabba.m sacchikata.m hoti, tassa na sabbena sabba.m maanaanusayo pahiino hoti, na sabbena sabba.m bhavaraagaanusayo pahiino hoti, na sabbena sabba.m avijjaanusayo pahiino hoti. so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, divasa.msantatte {divasasantatte (sii0 syaa0) ma0 ni0 2.154} ayokapaale ha~n~namaane papa.tikaa nibbattitvaa nibbaayeyya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- `no cassa no ca me siyaa, na bhavissati na me bhavissati, yadatthi ya.m bhuuta.m ta.m pajahaamii'ti upekkha.m pa.tilabhati. so bhave ^a^T4.0072^ea^ na rajjati, sambhave na rajjati, atthuttari pada.m santa.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. ta~nca khvassa pada.m na sabbena ^a^P4.0071^ea^ sabba.m sacchikata.m hoti, tassa na sabbena sabba.m maanaanusayo pahiino hoti, na sabbena sabba.m bhavaraagaanusayo pahiino hoti, na sabbena sabba.m avijjaanusayo pahiino hoti. so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- `no cassa no ca me siyaa, na bhavissati na me bhavissati, yadatthi ya.m bhuuta.m ta.m pajahaamii'ti upekkha.m pa.tilabhati. so bhave na rajjati, sambhave na rajjati, atthuttari pada.m santa.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. ta~nca khvassa pada.m na sabbena sabba.m sacchikata.m hoti, tassa na sabbena sabba.m maanaanusayo pahiino hoti, na sabbena sabba.m bhavaraagaanusayo pahiino hoti, na sabbena sabba.m avijjaanusayo pahiino hoti. so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, divasa.msantatte ayokapaale ha~n~namaane papa.tikaa nibbattitvaa uppatitvaa ^a^T4.0073^ea^ nibbaayeyya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- no cassa no ca me siyaa...pe0... so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti.

[03] ``idha ^a^M2.0451^ea^ ^a^V2.0214^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- no cassa no ca me siyaa...pe0... so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, divasa.msantatte ayokapaale ha~n~namaane papa.tikaa nibbattitvaa uppatitvaa anupahacca tala.m nibbaayeyya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- no cassa no ca me siyaa...pe0... ^a^P4.0072^ea^ so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- no cassa no ca me siyaa...pe0... so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, divasa.msantatte ayokapaale ha~n~namaane papa.tikaa nibbattitvaa uppatitvaa upahacca tala.m nibbaayeyya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- no cassa no ca me siyaa...pe0... so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- no cassa no ca me siyaa...pe0... so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, divasa.msantatte ayokapaale ha~n~namaane papa.tikaa nibbattitvaa uppatitvaa paritte ti.napu~nje vaa ka.t.thapu~nje vaa nipateyya. saa tattha aggimpi janeyya, dhuumampi janeyya, aggimpi janetvaa dhuumampi janetvaa tameva paritta.m ti.napu~nja.m vaa ka.t.thapu~nja.m vaa pariyaadiyitvaa anaahaaraa nibbaayeyya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- no cassa no ca me siyaa...pe0... so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti.

[03] ``idha ^a^P4.0073^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- no cassa no ca me siyaa...pe0... so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, divasa.msantatte ayokapaale ha~n~namaane papa.tikaa nibbattitvaa uppatitvaa ^a^T4.0074^ea^ vipule ti.napu~nje vaa ka.t.thapu~nje vaa nipateyya. saa tattha aggimpi janeyya, dhuumampi janeyya, aggimpi janetvaa dhuumampi janetvaa tameva vipula.m ti.napu~nja.m vaa ka.t.thapu~nja.m vaa ^a^V2.0215^ea^ pariyaadiyitvaa anaahaaraa nibbaayeyya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^M2.0452^ea^ eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- no cassa no ca me siyaa...pe0... so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- `no cassa no ca me siyaa, na bhavissati na me bhavissati, yadatthi ya.m bhuuta.m ta.m pajahaamii'ti upekkha.m pa.tilabhati. so bhave na rajjati, sambhave na rajjati, atthuttari pada.m santa.m sammapa~n~naaya passati. ta~nca khvassa pada.m na sabbena sabba.m sacchikata.m hoti, tassa na sabbena sabba.m maanaanusayo pahiino hoti, na sabbena sabba.m bhavaraagaanusayo pahiino hoti, na sabbena sabba.m avijjaanusayo pahiino hoti. so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa uddha.msoto hoti akani.t.thagaamii. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, divasa.msantatte ayokapaale ha~n~namaane papa.tikaa nibbattitvaa uppatitvaa mahante ti.napu~nje vaa ka.t.thapu~nje vaa nipateyya. saa tattha aggimpi janeyya, dhuumampi janeyya, aggimpi janetvaa dhuumampi janetvaa tameva mahanta.m ti.napu~nja.m ^a^P4.0074^ea^ vaa ka.t.thapu~nja.m vaa pariyaadiyitvaa gacchampi daheyya {.daheyya (a~n~nattha)}, daayampi daheyya, gacchampi dahitvaa daayampi dahitvaa haritanta.m vaa pathanta.m vaa {panthanta.m vaa (sii0) syaamapotthake ida.m na dissati} selanta.m vaa udakanta.m vaa rama.niiya.m vaa bhuumibhaaga.m aagamma anaahaaraa nibbaayeyya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- no cassa no ca me siyaa...pe0... so pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa uddha.msoto hoti akani.t.thagaamii. imaa kho, bhikkhave, satta purisagatiyo.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, anupaadaaparinibbaana.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m pa.tipanno hoti -- `no cassa no ca me siyaa, na bhavissati na me bhavissati, yadatthi ya.m bhuuta.m ta.m pajahaamii'ti upekkha.m pa.tilabhati. so bhave na rajjati, sambhave na rajjati, atthuttari ^a^T4.0075^ea^ pada.m santa.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. ta~nca khvassa pada.m sabbena sabba.m sacchikata.m hoti, tassa sabbena sabba.m maanaanusayo pahiino hoti, sabbena sabba.m bhavaraagaanusayo pahiino hoti, sabbena sabba.m avijjaanusayo pahiino hoti. so aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, anupaadaaparinibbaana.m. imaa kho, bhikkhave, satta purisagatiyo anupaadaa ca parinibbaana''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M2.0453^ea^ ^a^V2.0216^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. atha kho dve devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m gijjhakuu.ta.m ^a^P4.0075^ea^ obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho ekaa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etaa, bhante, bhikkhuniyo vimuttaa''ti. aparaa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etaa, bhante, bhikkhuniyo anupaadisesaa suvimuttaa''ti. idamavocu.m taa devataa. samanu~n~no satthaa ahosi. atha kho taa devataa ``samanu~n~no satthaa''ti bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.msu.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ima.m, bhikkhave, ratti.m dve devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m gijjhakuu.ta.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, bhikkhave, ekaa devataa ma.m etadavoca -- `etaa, bhante, bhikkhuniyo vimuttaa'ti. aparaa devataa ma.m etadavoca ^a^T4.0076^ea^ -- `etaa, bhante, bhikkhuniyo anupaadisesaa suvimuttaa'ti. idamavocu.m, bhikkhave, taa devataa. ida.m vatvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.msuu''ti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavato aviduure nisinno hoti. atha kho aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa etadahosi -- ``katamesaana.m kho devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'''ti? tena kho pana samayena tisso naama bhikkhu adhunaakaala"nkato a~n~natara.m brahmaloka.m upapanno hoti. tatraapi na.m eva.m jaananti -- ``tisso brahmaa mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva.m -- gijjhakuu.te pabbate antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. addasaa kho tisso brahmaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m duuratova ^a^M2.0454^ea^ aagacchanta.m. disvaa aayasmanta.m ^a^P4.0076^ea^ mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``ehi kho, maarisa moggallaana; svaagata.m, maarisa moggallaana! cirassa.m kho, maarisa moggallaana, ima.m pariyaayamakaasi ^a^V2.0217^ea^, yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. nisiida, maarisa moggallaana, idamaasana.m pa~n~natta''nti. nisiidi kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano pa~n~natte aasane. tissopi kho brahmaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho tissa.m brahmaana.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano etadavoca -- ``katamesaana.m kho, tissa ^a^T4.0077^ea^, devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'''ti? ``brahmakaayikaana.m kho, maarisa moggallaana, devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'''ti.

[03] ``sabbesa~n~neva kho, tissa, brahmakaayikaana.m devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'''ti? ``na kho, maarisa moggallaana, sabbesa.m brahmakaayikaana.m devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'''ti.

[03] ``ye kho te, maarisa moggallaana, brahmakaayikaa devaa brahmena aayunaa santu.t.thaa brahmena va.n.nena brahmena sukhena brahmena yasena brahmena aadhipateyyena santu.t.thaa, te uttari nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti. tesa.m na eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'ti. ye ca kho te, maarisa moggallaana, brahmakaayikaa devaa brahmena aayunaa asantu.t.thaa, brahmena va.n.nena brahmena sukhena brahmena yasena brahmena aadhipateyyena asantu.t.thaa, te ca uttari nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m ^a^P4.0077^ea^ pajaananti. tesa.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'''ti.

[03] ``idha, maarisa moggallaana, bhikkhu ubhatobhaagavimutto hoti. tamena.m te devaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa ubhatobhaagavimutto. yaavassa kaayo .thassati taava na.m dakkhanti devamanussaa. kaayassa bhedaa na na.m dakkhanti ^a^T4.0078^ea^ devamanussaa'ti. evampi kho, maarisa moggallaana ^a^M2.0455^ea^, tesa.m devaana.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'''ti.

[03] ``idha pana, maarisa moggallaana, bhikkhu pa~n~naavimutto hoti. tamena.m te devaa eva.m jaananti ^a^V2.0218^ea^ -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa pa~n~naavimutto. yaavassa kaayo .thassati taava na.m dakkhanti devamanussaa. kaayassa bhedaa na na.m dakkhanti devamanussaa'ti. evampi kho, maarisa moggallaana, tesa.m devaana.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'''ti.

[03] ``idha pana, maarisa moggallaana, bhikkhu kaayasakkhii hoti. tamena.m devaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa kaayasakkhii. appeva naama ayamaayasmaa anulomikaani senaasanaani pa.tisevamaano kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano indriyaani samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaa'ti. evampi kho, maarisa moggallaana, tesa.m devaana.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'''ti.

[03] ``idha pana, maarisa moggallaana, bhikkhu di.t.thippatto hoti...pe0... saddhaavimutto hoti...pe0... dhammaanusaarii hoti. tamena.m te devaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa dhammaanusaarii ^a^P4.0078^ea^. appeva naama ayamaayasmaa anulomikaani senaasanaani pa.tisevamaano kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano indriyaani samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva ^a^T4.0079^ea^ dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaa'ti. evampi kho, maarisa moggallaana, tesa.m devaana.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tissassa brahmuno bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva.m -- brahmaloke antarahito gijjhakuu.te pabbate paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^M2.0456^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano yaavatako ahosi tissena brahmunaa saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi.

[03] ``na ^a^V2.0219^ea^ hi pana te, moggallaana, tisso brahmaa sattama.m animittavihaari.m puggala.m deseti''. ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo; etassa, sugata, kaalo! ya.m bhagavaa sattama.m animittavihaari.m puggala.m deseyya. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena hi, moggallaana, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``idha, moggallaana, bhikkhu sabbanimittaana.m amanasikaaraa animitta.m cetosamaadhi.m upasampajja viharati. tamena.m te devaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa sabbanimittaana.m amanasikaaraa animitta.m cetosamaadhi.m upasampajja viharati. appeva naama ayamaayasmaa anulomikaani senaasanaani pa.tisevamaano kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano ^a^T4.0080^ea^ indriyaani samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa ^a^P4.0079^ea^ upasampajja vihareyyaa'ti. eva.m kho, moggallaana, tesa.m devaana.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `saupaadisese vaa saupaadisesoti, anupaadisese vaa anupaadiseso'''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho siiho senaapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho siiho senaapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``sakkaa nu kho, bhante, sandi.t.thika.m daanaphala.m pa~n~naapetu''nti?

[03] ``tena hi, siiha, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami, yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, siiha, idha dve purisaa -- eko puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, eko puriso saddho daanapati ^a^M2.0457^ea^ anuppadaanarato. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, siiha, ka.m nu kho {ki.m nu kho (ka0)} arahanto pa.thama.m anukampantaa anukampeyyu.m -- `yo vaa so puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, yo vaa so puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato'''ti?

[03] ``yo ^a^V2.0220^ea^ so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, kinta.m {kinti (ka0)} arahanto pa.thama.m anukampantaa anukampissanti! yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato ta.myeva arahanto pa.thama.m anukampantaa anukampeyyu.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, siiha, ka.m nu kho ^a^T4.0081^ea^ arahanto pa.thama.m upasa"nkamantaa upasa"nkameyyu.m -- `yo vaa so puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, yo vaa so puriso ^a^P4.0080^ea^ saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato'''ti? ``yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, kinta.m arahanto pa.thama.m upasa"nkamantaa upasa"nkamissanti! yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato ta.myeva arahanto pa.thama.m upasa"nkamantaa upasa"nkameyyu.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, siiha, kassa nu kho arahanto pa.thama.m pa.tigga.nhantaa pa.tigga.nheyyu.m -- `yo vaa so puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, yo vaa so puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato'''ti? ``yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, kinta.m tassa arahanto pa.thama.m pa.tigga.nhantaa pa.tigga.nhissanti! yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato tasseva arahanto pa.thama.m pa.tigga.nhantaa pa.tigga.nheyyu.m'''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, siiha, kassa nu kho arahanto pa.thama.m dhamma.m desentaa deseyyu.m -- `yo vaa so puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, yo vaa so puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato'''ti? ``yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, kinta.m tassa arahanto pa.thama.m dhamma.m desentaa desessanti! yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato tasseva arahanto pa.thama.m dhamma.m desentaa deseyyu.m'' ^a^T4.0082^ea^.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^M2.0458^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, siiha, kassa nu kho kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggaccheyya -- `yo vaa so puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, yo vaa so puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato'''ti? ``yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, kinta.m tassa kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggacchissati! yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato tasseva kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggaccheyya''.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^V2.0221^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, siiha, ko nu kho ya.myadeva parisa.m upasa"nkameyya, yadi khattiyaparisa.m yadi braahma.naparisa.m yadi gahapatiparisa.m yadi sama.naparisa.m visaarado ^a^P4.0081^ea^ upasa"nkameyya ama"nkubhuuto -- `yo vaa so puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, yo vaa so puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato'''ti? ``yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, ki.m so ya.myadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamissati, yadi khattiyaparisa.m yadi braahma.naparisa.m yadi gahapatiparisa.m yadi sama.naparisa.m visaarado upasa"nkamissati ama"nkubhuuto! yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato so ya.myadeva parisa.m upasa"nkameyya, yadi khattiyaparisa.m yadi braahma.naparisa.m yadi gahapatiparisa.m yadi sama.naparisa.m visaarado upasa"nkameyya ama"nkubhuuto''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, siiha, ko nu kho kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyya -- `yo vaa so puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, yo vaa so puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato'''ti ^a^T4.0083^ea^? ``yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharii kadariyo paribhaasako, ki.m so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjissati! yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho daanapati anuppadaanarato so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyya''.

[03] ``yaanimaani, bhante, bhagavataa sandi.t.thikaani daanaphalaani akkhaataani, naaha.m ettha bhagavato saddhaaya gacchaami. ahampi etaani jaanaami. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati, ma.m arahanto pa.thama.m anukampantaa anukampanti. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati, ma.m arahanto pa.thama.m upasa"nkamantaa upasa"nkamanti. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati, mayha.m arahanto pa.thama.m pa.tigga.nhantaa pa.tigga.nhanti ^a^M2.0459^ea^. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati, mayha.m arahanto pa.thama.m dhamma.m desentaa desenti. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati, mayha.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `siiho senaapati daayako kaarako sa"nghupa.t.thaako'ti ^a^P4.0082^ea^. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati ya.myadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamaami, yadi khattiyaparisa.m...pe0... yadi sama.naparisa.m visaarado upasa"nkamaami ama"nkubhuuto. yaanimaani, bhante, bhagavataa sandi.t.thikaani daanaphalaani akkhaataani, naaha.m ettha bhagavato saddhaaya gacchaami. ahampi etaani jaanaami. ya~nca kho ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa evamaaha -- `daayako, siiha, daanapati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjatii'ti ^a^V2.0222^ea^. etaaha.m na jaanaami, ettha ca panaaha.m, bhagavato saddhaaya gacchaamii''ti. ``evameta.m, siiha ^a^T4.0084^ea^; evameta.m, siiha! daayako, siiha, daanapati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arakkheyyaani, tiihi ca anupavajjo. katamaani cattaari tathaagatassa arakkheyyaani? parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro, bhikkhave, tathaagato; natthi tathaagatassa kaayaduccarita.m ya.m tathaagato rakkheyya -- `maa me ida.m paro a~n~naasii'ti. parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro, bhikkhave, tathaagato; natthi tathaagatassa vaciiduccarita.m ya.m tathaagato rakkheyya -- `maa me ida.m paro a~n~naasii'ti. parisuddhamanosamaacaaro, bhikkhave, tathaagato; natthi tathaagatassa manoduccarita.m ya.m tathaagato rakkheyya -- `maa me ida.m paro a~n~naasii'ti. parisuddhaajiivo, bhikkhave, tathaagato; natthi tathaagatassa micchaaaajiivo ya.m tathaagato rakkheyya -- `maa me ida.m paro a~n~naasii'ti. imaani cattaari tathaagatassa arakkheyyaani.

[03] ``katamehi tiihi anupavajjo? svaakkhaatadhammo ^a^P4.0083^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagato. tatra vata ma.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m sahadhammena pa.ticodessati -- `itipi tva.m na svaakkhaatadhammo'ti. nimittameta.m, bhikkhave, na samanupassaami. etamaha.m {eta.mpaha.m (sii0 syaa0)}, bhikkhave ^a^M2.0460^ea^, nimitta.m asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesaarajjappatto viharaami.

[03] ``supa~n~nattaa kho pana me, bhikkhave, saavakaana.m nibbaanagaaminii pa.tipadaa. yathaapa.tipannaa mama saavakaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme ^a^T4.0085^ea^ saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti. tatra vata ma.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m sahadhammena pa.ticodessati -- `itipi te na supa~n~nattaa saavakaana.m nibbaanagaaminii pa.tipadaa. yathaapa.tipannaa tava saavakaa aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii'ti. nimittameta.m, bhikkhave, na samanupassaami ^a^V2.0223^ea^. etamaha.m, bhikkhave, nimitta.m asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesaarajjappatto viharaami.

[03] ``anekasataa kho pana me, bhikkhave, saavakaparisaa aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti. tatra vata ma.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m sahadhammena pa.ticodessati -- `itipi te na anekasataa saavakaparisaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii'ti. nimittameta.m, bhikkhave, na samanupassaami. etamaha.m, bhikkhave, nimitta.m ^a^P4.0084^ea^ asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesaarajjappatto viharaami. imehi tiihi anupavajjo.
[03] ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari tathaagatassa arakkheyyaani, imehi ca tiihi anupavajjo''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kimilaaya.m viharati niculavane {ve.luvane (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) a0 ni0 5.202; 7.40}. atha kho aayasmaa kimilo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^T4.0086^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa kimilo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti?

[03] ``idha ^a^M2.0461^ea^, kimila, tathaagate parinibbute bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo satthari agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, dhamme agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, sa"nghe agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, sikkhaaya agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, samaadhismi.m agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, appamaade agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, pa.tisanthaare agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa. aya.m kho, kimila, hetu aya.m paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti.

[03] ``ko ^a^V2.0224^ea^ pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti? ``idha, kimila, tathaagate parinibbute bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo satthari sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, dhamme sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, sa"nghe sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, sikkhaaya sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, samaadhismi.m sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, appamaade sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, pa.tisanthaare sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa. aya.m kho, kimila, hetu aya.m paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ ``sattahi ^a^P4.0085^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu nacirasseva aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya. katamehi sattahi ^a^T4.0087^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, siilavaa hoti, bahussuto hoti, pa.tisalliino hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, satimaa hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu nacirasseva aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire bhesaka.laavane migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano magadhesu kallavaa.laputtagaame {kallavaalamuttagaame (syaa0)} pacalaayamaano nisinno ^a^M2.0462^ea^ hoti. addasaa kho bhagavaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m magadhesu kallavaa.laputtagaame pacalaayamaana.m nisinna.m. disvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva.m -- bhaggesu susumaaragire bhesaka.laavane migadaaye antarahito magadhesu kallavaa.laputtagaame aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa sammukhe paaturahosi. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca --

[03] ``pacalaayasi no tva.m, moggallaana, pacalaayasi no tva.m, moggallaanaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante'' ^a^V2.0225^ea^. ``tasmaatiha, moggallaana, yathaasa~n~nissa te viharato ta.m middha.m okkamati, ta.m sa~n~na.m maa manasaakaasi {maa manasikaasi (sii0), manasi kareyyaasi (syaa0), manasaakaasi (ka0)}, ta.m ^a^P4.0086^ea^ sa~n~na.m maa bahulamakaasi {ta.m sa~n~na.m bahula.m kareyyaasi (syaa0), ta.m sa~n~na.m bahulamakaasi (ka0)}. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, moggallaana, vijjati ya.m te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha''.

[03] ``no ce te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha, tato tva.m, moggallaana, yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakkeyyaasi anuvicaareyyaasi, manasaa ^a^T4.0088^ea^ anupekkheyyaasi. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha.

[03] ``no ce te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha, tato tva.m, moggallaana, yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m kareyyaasi. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha.

[03] ``no ce te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha, tato tva.m, moggallaana, ubho ka.n.nasotaani aavi~ncheyyaasi {aavi~njeyyaasi (sii0 syaa0)}, paa.ninaa gattaani anumajjeyyaasi. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha.

[03] ``no ce te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha, tato tva.m, moggallaana, u.t.thaayaasanaa udakena akkhiini anumajjitvaa {pani~njitvaa (ka0)} disaa anuvilokeyyaasi ^a^M2.0463^ea^, nakkhattaani taarakaruupaani ullokeyyaasi. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha.

[03] ``no ce te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha, tato tva.m, moggallaana, aalokasa~n~na.m manasi kareyyaasi, divaasa~n~na.m adhi.t.thaheyyaasi -- yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa. iti viva.tena {viva.t.tena (syaa0), middhavigatena (ka0)} cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveyyaasi. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha.

[03] ``no ^a^P4.0087^ea^ ce te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha, tato tva.m, moggallaana, pacchaapuresa~n~nii {pacchaapure tathaasa~n~nii (katthaci)} ca"nkama.m adhi.t.thaheyyaasi antogatehi indriyehi abahigatena maanasena. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha.

[03] ``no ^a^V2.0226^ea^ ce te eva.m viharato ta.m middha.m pahiiyetha, tato tva.m, moggallaana, dakkhi.nena ^a^T4.0089^ea^ passena siihaseyya.m kappeyyaasi paade paada.m accaadhaaya sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa. pa.tibuddhena ca {pa.tibuddheneva (syaa0)} te, moggallaana, khippa~n~neva paccu.t.thaatabba.m -- `na seyyasukha.m na passasukha.m na middhasukha.m anuyutto viharissaamii'ti. eva~nhi te, moggallaana, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, moggallaana, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na uccaaso.n.da.m paggahetvaa kulaani upasa"nkamissaamii'ti. eva~nhi te, moggallaana, sikkhitabba.m. sace, moggallaana, bhikkhu uccaaso.n.da.m paggahetvaa kulaani upasa"nkamati, santi hi, moggallaana, kulesu kiccakara.niiyaani. yehi manussaa aagata.m bhikkhu.m na manasi karonti, tatra bhikkhussa eva.m hoti -- `kosu naama idaani ma.m imasmi.m kule paribhindi, virattaruupaa daanime mayi manussaa'ti. itissa alaabhena ma"nkubhaavo, ma"nkubhuutassa uddhacca.m, uddhatassa asa.mvaro, asa.mvutassa aaraa citta.m samaadhimhaa.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, moggallaana, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na viggaahikakatha.m kathessaamii'ti. eva~nhi te, moggallaana, sikkhitabba.m. viggaahikaaya, moggallaana, kathaaya sati ^a^M2.0464^ea^ kathaabaahulla.m paa.tika"nkha.m, kathaabaahulle sati uddhacca.m, uddhatassa asa.mvaro, asa.mvutassa aaraa citta.m samaadhimhaa {naaha.m moggalaana sabbeheva samagga.m va.n.nayaami gaha.t.thehi. pabbajitehi kho aha.m moggallaana samagga.m va.n.nayaami (ka0)}. naaha.m, moggallaana, sabbeheva sa.msagga.m va.n.nayaami. na panaaha.m ^a^P4.0088^ea^, moggallaana, sabbeheva sa.msagga.m na va.n.nayaami. sagaha.t.thapabbajitehi kho aha.m, moggallaana, sa.msagga.m na va.n.nayaami {naaha.m moggallaana sabbeheva samagga.m va.n.nayaami gaha.t.thehi, pabbajitehi kho aha.m moggallaana samagga.m va.n.nayaami (ka0)}. yaani ca kho taani senaasanaani appasaddaani appanigghosaani vijanavaataani manussaraahasseyyakaani {manussaraahaseyyakaani (sii0 syaa0)} pa.tisallaanasaaruppaani tathaaruupehi ^a^T4.0090^ea^ senaasanehi sa.msagga.m {samagga.m (ka0)} va.n.nayaamii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutto hoti accantani.t.tho accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaano se.t.tho devamanussaana''nti?

[03] ``idha, moggallaana, bhikkhuno suta.m hoti -- `sabbe dhammaa naala.m abhinivesaayaa'ti; eva~nceta.m, moggallaana, bhikkhuno suta.m hoti -- `sabbe dhammaa naala.m abhinivesaayaa'ti. so sabba.m dhamma.m abhijaanaati, sabba.m dhamma.m abhi~n~naaya sabba.m dhamma.m parijaanaati. sabba.m dhamma.m pari~n~naaya ^a^V2.0227^ea^ ya.mki~nci vedana.m vediyati sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa. so taasu vedanaasu aniccaanupassii viharati, viraagaanupassii viharati, nirodhaanupassii viharati, pa.tinissaggaanupassii viharati. so taasu vedanaasu aniccaanupassii viharanto viraagaanupassii viharanto nirodhaanupassii viharanto pa.tinissaggaanupassii viharanto na ki~nci {na ca ki~nci (sii0 syaa0 ka0) ma0 ni0 1.390 passitabba.m} loke upaadiyati, anupaadiya.m na paritassati, aparitassa.m paccatta.myeva parinibbaayati. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. ettaavataa kho, moggallaana, bhikkhu sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutto hoti accantani.t.tho accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaano se.t.tho devamanussaana''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ {itivu0 22 itivuttakepi} ``maa ^a^M2.0465^ea^, bhikkhave, pu~n~naana.m bhaayittha. sukhasseta.m, bhikkhave ^a^P4.0089^ea^, adhivacana.m yadida.m pu~n~naani {yadida.m pu~n~nanti (sii0), yadida.m pu~n~naani (ka0)}. abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m {bhikkhave diigharatta.m i.t.tha.m (syaa0), bhikkhave diigharatta.m pu~n~naana.m i.t.tha.m (?)}, bhikkhave, diigharatta.m kataana.m pu~n~naana.m diigharatta.m i.t.tha.m {bhikkhave diigharatta.m i.t.tha.m (syaa0), bhikkhave diigharatta.m pu~n~naana.m i.t.tha.m (?)} kanta.m manaapa.m vipaaka.m paccanubhuuta.m. satta vassaani metta.m citta.m bhaavesi.m ^a^T4.0091^ea^. satta vassaani metta.m citta.m bhaavetvaa satta sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe nayima.m loka.m punaagamaasi.m. sa.mva.t.tamaane sudaaha.m {sa.mva.t.tamaanassudaaha.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave, loke aabhassaruupago homi, viva.t.tamaane loke su~n~na.m brahmavimaana.m upapajjaami.

[01] ``tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, brahmaa homi mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii. chatti.msakkhattu.m kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, sakko ahosi.m devaanamindo; anekasatakkhattu.m raajaa ahosi.m cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, imaani satta ratanaani ahesu.m, seyyathida.m -- cakkaratana.m, hatthiratana.m, assaratana.m, ma.niratana.m, itthiratana.m, gahapatiratana.m, pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho pana me, bhikkhave, puttaa ahesu.m suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasi''nti {ajjhaavasanti (syaa0) ajjhaavasati (sii0 ka0)}.

[21] ``cakkavattii ^a^M2.0466^ea^ ahu.m raajaa, jambuma.n.dassa {jabmudiipassa (sii0), jambusa.n.dassa (syaa0)} issaro.

[22] pahuutavittuupakara.no, raajaa hoti {homi (sii0 syaa0)} pataapavaa..
[21] ``iddhimaa yasavaa hoti {homi (sii0 syaa0)}, jambuma.n.dassa {jambusa.n.dassa (sii0 syaa0)} issaro.
[22] ko sutvaa nappasiideyya, api ka.nhaabhijaatiyo..

[22] saddhammo garukaatabbo, sara.m buddhaanasaasana''nti.. navama.m.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0229^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. tena kho pana samayena anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa nivesane manussaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa honti. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m ^a^T4.0093^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ki.m ^a^M2.0467^ea^ nu te, gahapati, nivesane manussaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa keva.t.taa ma~n~ne macchavilope''ti? ``aya.m, bhante, sujaataa gharasu.nhaa a.d.dhakulaa aaniitaa. saa neva sassu.m aadiyati, na sasura.m aadiyati, na saamika.m aadiyati, bhagavantampi na sakkaroti na garu.m karoti na maaneti na puujetii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa sujaata.m gharasu.nha.m aamantesi -- ``ehi, sujaate''ti! ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho sujaataa gharasu.nhaa bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho sujaata.m gharasu.nha.m bhagavaa etadavoca ^a^P4.0092^ea^ --

[03] ``satta kho imaa, sujaate, purisassa bhariyaayo. katamaa satta? vadhakasamaa, coriisamaa, ayyasamaa, maataasamaa, bhaginiisamaa, sakhiisamaa, daasiisamaa. imaa kho, sujaate, satta purisassa bhariyaayo. taasa.m tva.m katamaa''ti? ``na kho aha.m {naaha.m (syaa0)}, bhante, imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaaha.m imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m jaaneyya''nti. ``tena hi, sujaate, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho sujaataa gharasu.nhaa bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --
[21] ``padu.t.thacittaa ^a^V2.0230^ea^ ahitaanukampinii,
[27] a~n~nesu rattaa atima~n~nate pati.m.
[26] dhanena kiitassa vadhaaya ussukaa,
[27] yaa evaruupaa purisassa bhariyaa.
[22] `vadhaa ca bhariyaa'ti ca saa pavuccati..
[21] ``ya.m itthiyaa vindati saamiko dhana.m,
[27] sippa.m va.nijja~nca kasi.m adhi.t.thaha.m.
[26] appampi tassa apahaatumicchati,
[27] yaa ^a^T4.0094^ea^ evaruupaa purisassa bhariyaa.
[22] `corii ca bhariyaa'ti ca saa pavuccati..
[21] ``akammakaamaa ^a^M2.0468^ea^ alasaa mahagghasaa,
[27] pharusaa ca ca.n.dii duruttavaadinii.
[26] u.t.thaayakaana.m abhibhuyya vattati,
[27] yaa evaruupaa purisassa bhariyaa.
[22] `ayyaa ca bhariyaa'ti ca saa pavuccati..
[21] ``yaa ^a^P4.0093^ea^ sabbadaa hoti hitaanukampinii,
[27] maataava putta.m anurakkhate pati.m.
[26] tato dhana.m sambhatamassa rakkhati,
[27] yaa evaruupaa purisassa bhariyaa.
[22] `maataa ca bhariyaa'ti ca saa pavuccati..
[21] ``yathaapi je.t.thaa bhaginii kani.t.thakaa {ka.ni.t.thaa (sii0), kani.t.thaa (syaa0)},
[27] sagaaravaa hoti sakamhi saamike.
[26] hiriimanaa ^a^V2.0231^ea^ bhattuvasaanuvattinii,
[22] yaa evaruupaa purisassa bhariyaa.`bhaginii ca bhariyaa'ti ca saa pavuccati..
[21] ``yaaciidha disvaana pati.m pamodati,
[27] sakhii sakhaara.mva cirassamaagata.m.
[26] koleyyakaa siilavatii patibbataa,
[27] yaa evaruupaa purisassa bhariyaa.
[22] `sakhii ca bhariyaa'ti ca saa pavuccati..
[21] ``akkuddhasantaa vadhada.n.datajjitaa,
[27] adu.t.thacittaa patino titikkhati.
[26] akkodhanaa bhattuvasaanuvattinii,
[27] yaa evaruupaa purisassa bhariyaa.
[22] `daasii ca bhariyaa'ti ca saa pavuccati..
[21] ``yaaciidha bhariyaa vadhakaati vuccati,
[27] `corii ca ayyaa'ti ca yaa pavuccati.
[26] dussiilaruupaa pharusaa anaadaraa,
[22] kaayassa bhedaa niraya.m vajanti taa..
[21] ``yaaciidha ^a^M2.0469^ea^ maataa bhaginii sakhiiti ca,
[27] `daasii ca bhariyaa'ti ca saa pavuccati.
[26] siile .thitattaa cirarattasa.mvutaa,
[22] kaayassa bhedaa sugati.m vajanti taa''ti..

[03] ``imaa ^a^T4.0096^ea^ kho, sujaate, satta purisassa bhariyaayo. taasa.m tva.m katamaa''ti? ``ajjatagge ^a^P4.0094^ea^ ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa daasiisama.m saamikassa bhariya.m dhaaretuu''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ ``sattime ^a^V2.0232^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa sapattakantaa sapattakara.naa kodhana.m aagacchanti itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa. katame satta? idha, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa eva.m icchati -- `aho vataaya.m dubba.n.no assaa'ti! ta.m kissa hetu? na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa va.n.navataaya nandati. kodhanoya.m {kodhanaaya.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhaabhibhuuto kodhapareto, ki~ncaapi so hoti sunhaato suvilitto kappitakesamassu odaatavatthavasano {odaatavasano (ka0)}; atha kho so dubba.n.nova hoti kodhaabhibhuuto. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakara.no kodhana.m aagacchati itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa eva.m icchati -- `aho vataaya.m dukkha.m sayeyyaa'ti! ta.m kissa hetu? na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sukhaseyyaaya nandati. kodhanoya.m, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhaabhibhuuto kodhapareto, ki~ncaapi so palla"nke seti gonakatthate pa.talikatthate kadalimigapavarapaccatthara.ne sauttaracchade ubhatolohitakuupadhaane; atha kho so dukkha~n~neva seti kodhaabhibhuuto. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakara.no kodhana.m aagacchati itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa eva.m icchati -- `aho vataaya.m na pacurattho assaa'ti! ta.m kissa hetu? na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa pacuratthataaya nandati ^a^P4.0095^ea^. kodhanoya.m ^a^T4.0097^ea^, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhaabhibhuuto kodhapareto, anatthampi gahetvaa `attho me gahito'ti ma~n~nati ^a^M2.0470^ea^, atthampi gahetvaa `anattho me gahito'ti ma~n~nati. tassime dhammaa a~n~nama~n~na.m vipaccaniikaa gahitaa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti kodhaabhibhuutassa. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakara.no kodhana.m aagacchati itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa eva.m icchati -- `aho vataaya.m na bhogavaa assaa'ti! ta.m kissa hetu? na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa bhogavataaya nandati. kodhanassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa kodhaabhibhuutassa kodhaparetassa, yepissa te honti bhogaa u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigataa ^a^V2.0233^ea^ baahaabalaparicitaa sedaavakkhittaa dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa, tepi raajaano raajakosa.m pavesenti kodhaabhibhuutassa. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sapattakanto sapattakara.no kodhana.m aagacchati itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa eva.m icchati -- `aho vataaya.m na yasavaa assaa'ti! ta.m kissa hetu? na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa yasavataaya nandati. kodhanoya.m, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhaabhibhuuto kodhapareto, yopissa so hoti yaso appamaadaadhigato, tamhaapi dha.msati kodhaabhibhuuto. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakara.no kodhana.m aagacchati itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa eva.m icchati -- `aho vataaya.m na ^a^T4.0098^ea^ mittavaa assaa'ti! ta.m kissa hetu? na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa mittavataaya nandati. kodhana.m, bhikkhave, purisapuggala.m kodhaabhibhuuta.m kodhapareta.m, yepissa te honti mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa, tepi aarakaa parivajjanti kodhaabhibhuuta.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, cha.t.tho dhammo sapattakanto sapattakara.no kodhana.m aagacchati itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa.

[03] ``puna ^a^P4.0096^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa eva.m icchati -- `aho vataaya.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyyaa'ti! ta.m kissa hetu? na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sugatigamane nandati. kodhanoya.m, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhaabhibhuuto kodhapareto kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya...pe0... kaayassa ^a^M2.0471^ea^ bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati kodhaabhibhuuto. aya.m, bhikkhave, sattamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakara.no kodhana.m aagacchati itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, satta dhammaa sapattakantaa sapattakara.naa kodhana.m aagacchanti itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa''ti.

[22] kodhaabhibhuuto puriso, dhanajaani.m nigacchati..

[21] ``itaaya.m kodharuupena, maccupaaso guhaasayo.
[22] ta.m damena samucchinde, pa~n~naaviiriyena di.t.thiyaa..
[21] ``yathaa meta.m {ekameta.m (syaa0), ekameta.m (sii0)} akusala.m, samucchindetha pa.n.dito.
[22] tatheva dhamme sikkhetha, maa no dumma"nkuya.m ahu..

[22] dantaa kodha.m pahantvaana, parinibbanti anaasavaa''ti {parinibbissathanaasavaati (syaa0), parinibbi.msu anaasavaati (ka0)}.. ekaadasama.m.
