[22] kimila.m satta pacalaa, mettaa bhariyaa kodhekaadasaati..

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 5.24, 168; 2.6.50} ``hirottappe ^a^V2.0236^ea^ ^a^P4.0099^ea^, bhikkhave, asati hirottappavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti indriyasa.mvaro; indriyasa.mvare asati indriyasa.mvaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m ^a^T4.0101^ea^ ^a^M2.0473^ea^ hoti siila.m; siile asati siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasavipanno. tassa papa.tikaapi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi pheggupi saaropi na paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, hirottappe asati hirottappavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti indriyasa.mvaro; indriyasa.mvare asati indriyasa.mvaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti siila.m; siile asati siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``hirottappe, bhikkhave, sati hirottappasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti indriyasa.mvaro; indriyasa.mvare sati indriyasa.mvarasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti siila.m; siile sati siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage sati nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasasampanno. tassa papa.tikaapi paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi pheggupi saaropi paaripuuri.m gacchati ^a^V2.0237^ea^. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, hirottappe sati hirottappasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P4.0100^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m ^a^T4.0102^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati ambapaalivane. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``aniccaa ^a^M2.0474^ea^, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; adhuvaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; anassaasikaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa. yaava~ncida.m, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m ala.m virajjitu.m ala.m vimuccitu.m.

[03] ``sineru, bhikkhave, pabbataraajaa caturaasiitiyojanasahassaani aayaamena, caturaasiitiyojanasahassaani vitthaarena, caturaasiitiyojanasahassaani mahaasamudde ajjhogaa.lho, caturaasiitiyojanasahassaani mahaasamuddaa accuggato. hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena bahuuni vassaani bahuuni vassasataani bahuuni vassasahassaani bahuuni vassasatasahassaani devo na vassati. deve kho pana, bhikkhave, avassante ye kecime biijagaamabhuutagaamaa osadhiti.navanappatayo te ussussanti visussanti, na bhavanti. eva.m aniccaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; eva.m adhuvaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu.m.

[03] ``hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena dutiyo suuriyo paatubhavati. dutiyassa, bhikkhave, suuriyassa paatubhaavaa yaa kaaci kunnadiyo kusobbhaa {kussubbho (sii0), kussobbhaa (syaa0)} taa ussussanti visussanti, na bhavanti ^a^P4.0101^ea^. eva.m aniccaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu.m.

[03] ``hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena tatiyo ^a^V2.0238^ea^ suuriyo ^a^T4.0103^ea^ paatubhavati. tatiyassa, bhikkhave, suuriyassa paatubhaavaa yaa kaaci mahaanadiyo, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa, yamunaa, aciravatii, sarabhuu, mahii, taa ussussanti visussanti, na bhavanti. eva.m aniccaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu.m.

[03] ``hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena catuttho suuriyo paatubhavati. catutthassa, bhikkhave, suuriyassa paatubhaavaa ye te mahaasaraa yato imaa mahaanadiyo pavattanti, seyyathida.m -- anotattaa, siihapapaataa, rathakaaraa, ka.n.namu.n.daa, ku.naalaa, chaddantaa, mandaakiniyaa, taa ussussanti visussanti, na bhavanti. eva.m aniccaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu.m.

[03] ``hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena pa~ncamo suuriyo paatubhavati. pa~ncamassa, bhikkhave, suuriyassa ^a^M2.0475^ea^ paatubhaavaa yojanasatikaanipi mahaasamudde udakaani ogacchanti, dviyojanasatikaanipi mahaasamudde udakaani ogacchanti, tiyojanasatikaanipi, catuyojanasatikaanipi, pa~ncayojanasatikaanipi, chayojanasatikaanipi, sattayojanasatikaanipi mahaasamudde udakaani ogacchanti; sattataalampi mahaasamudde udaka.m sa.n.thaati, chataalampi, pa~ncataalampi, catutaalampi, titaalampi, dvitaalampi ^a^P4.0102^ea^, taalamattampi mahaasamudde udaka.m sa.n.thaati; sattaporisampi mahaasamudde udaka.m sa.n.thaati, chaporisampi, pa~ncaporisampi, catuporisampi, tiporisampi, dviporisampi, porisampi {porisamattampi (syaa0)}, a.d.dhaporisampi, ka.timattampi, ja.n.nukaamattampi, gopphakamattampi mahaasamudde udaka.m sa.n.thaati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye thullaphusitake deve vassante tattha tattha gopadesu {gopphakapadesesu (ka0)} udakaani .thitaani ^a^T4.0104^ea^ honti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tattha tattha gopphakamattaani {gopadamattaani (sii0 syaa0)} mahaasamudde udakaani .thitaani honti. pa~ncamassa, bhikkhave, suuriyassa paatubhaavaa a"ngulipabbamattampi mahaasamudde udaka.m na hoti. eva.m aniccaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu.m.

[03] ``hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena cha.t.tho suuriyo paatubhavati. cha.t.thassa, bhikkhave, suuriyassa paatubhaavaa aya~nca mahaapathavii sineru ca pabbataraajaa dhuumaayanti sa.mdhuumaayanti sampadhuumaayanti {dhuupaayanti sandhuupaayanti sampadhuupaayanti (sii0 syaa0)}. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kumbhakaarapaako aalepito {aalimpito (sii0 syaa0)} pa.thama.m dhuumeti sa.mdhuumeti sampadhuumeti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, cha.t.thassa suuriyassa paatubhaavaa ^a^V2.0239^ea^ aya~nca mahaapathavii sineru ca pabbataraajaa dhuumaayanti sa.mdhuumaayanti sampadhuumaayanti. eva.m aniccaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ala.m vimuccitu.m.

[03] ``hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena sattamo suuriyo paatubhavati. sattamassa ^a^P4.0103^ea^, bhikkhave, suuriyassa paatubhaavaa aya~nca mahaapathavii sineru ca pabbataraajaa aadippanti pajjalanti ekajaalaa bhavanti. imissaa ca, bhikkhave, mahaapathaviyaa sinerussa ^a^M2.0476^ea^ ca pabbataraajassa ^a^T4.0105^ea^ jhaayamaanaana.m dayhamaanaana.m acci vaatena khittaa yaava brahmalokaapi gacchati. sinerussa, bhikkhave, pabbataraajassa jhaayamaanassa dayhamaanassa vinassamaanassa mahataa tejokhandhena abhibhuutassa yojanasatikaanipi kuu.taani palujjanti dviyojanasatikaanipi, tiyojanasatikaanipi, catuyojanasatikaanipi, pa~ncayojanasatikaanipi kuu.taani palujjanti. imissaa ca, bhikkhave, mahaapathaviyaa sinerussa ca pabbataraajassa jhaayamaanaana.m dayhamaanaana.m neva chaarikaa pa~n~naayati na masi. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, sappissa vaa telassa vaa jhaayamaanassa dayhamaanassa neva chaarikaa pa~n~naayati na masi; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, imissaa ca mahaapathaviyaa sinerussa ca pabbataraajassa jhaayamaanaana.m dayhamaanaana.m neva chaarikaa pa~n~naayati na masi. eva.m aniccaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; eva.m adhuvaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa; eva.m anassaasikaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa. yaava~ncida.m, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m ala.m virajjitu.m ala.m vimuccitu.m.
[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, ko mantaa ko saddhaataa -- `aya~nca pathavii sineru ca pabbataraajaa dayhissanti vinassissanti, na bhavissantii'ti a~n~natra di.t.thapadehi?

[03] {a0 ni0 6.54; 7.73} ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, sunetto naama satthaa ahosi titthakaro kaamesu viitaraago. sunettassa kho pana, bhikkhave ^a^P4.0104^ea^, satthuno anekaani saavakasataani ahesu.m. sunetto, bhikkhave, satthaa saavakaana.m brahmalokasahabyataaya dhamma.m desesi. ye kho pana, bhikkhave, sunettassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyataaya dhamma.m desentassa sabbena sabba.m saasana.m aajaani.msu te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m brahmaloka.m upapajji.msu. ye na sabbena sabba.m saasana.m aajaani.msu te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa appekacce paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu, appekacce nimmaanaratiina.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu, appekacce tusitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu, appekacce yaamaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu ^a^T4.0106^ea^, appekacce taavati.msaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu ^a^V2.0240^ea^, appekacce caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu, appekacce khattiyamahaasaalaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu, appekacce braahma.namahaasaalaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu, appekacce gahapatimahaasaalaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu.

[03] ``atha ^a^M2.0477^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sunettassa satthuno etadahosi -- `na kho meta.m patiruupa.m yoha.m saavakaana.m samasamagatiyo assa.m abhisamparaaya.m, ya.mnuunaaha.m uttari metta.m {uttari magga.m (ka0)} bhaaveyya'''nti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, sunetto satthaa satta vassaani metta.m citta.m bhaavesi. satta vassaani metta.m citta.m bhaavetvaa satta sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe nayima.m loka.m punaraagamaasi. sa.mva.t.tamaane suda.m, bhikkhave ^a^P4.0105^ea^, loke aabhassaruupago hoti. viva.t.tamaane loke su~n~na.m brahmavimaana.m upapajjati. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, brahmaa hoti mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii. chatti.msakkhattu.m kho pana, bhikkhave, sakko ahosi devaanamindo. anekasatakkhattu.m raajaa ahosi cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa ahesu.m suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasi. so hi naama, bhikkhave, sunetto satthaa eva.m diighaayuko samaano eva.m cira.t.thitiko aparimutto ahosi -- `jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, aparimutto ^a^T4.0107^ea^ dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami''.

[03] ``ta.m kissa hetu? catunna.m dhammaana.m ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa. katamesa.m catunna.m? ariyassa, bhikkhave, siilassa ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa, ariyassa samaadhissa ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa, ariyaaya pa~n~naaya ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa, ariyaaya vimuttiyaa ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa. tayida.m, bhikkhave, ariya.m siila.m anubuddha.m pa.tividdha.m, ariyo samaadhi anubodho pa.tividdho, ariyaa pa~n~naa anubodhaa pa.tividdhaa, ariyaa vimutti anubodhaa pa.tividdhaa, ucchinnaa bhavata.nhaa, khii.naa bhavanetti, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti. idamavoca ^a^P4.0106^ea^ bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``siila.m ^a^V2.0241^ea^ samaadhi pa~n~naa ca, vimutti ca anuttaraa.
[22] anubuddhaa ime dhammaa, gotamena yasassinaa..
[21] ``iti buddho abhi~n~naaya, dhammamakkhaasi bhikkhuna.m.
[22] dukkhassantakaro satthaa, cakkhumaa parinibbuto''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ ``yato ^a^M2.0478^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m sattahi nagaraparikkhaarehi suparikkhata.m {suparikkhitta.m (ka0)} hoti, catunna~nca aahaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m akara.niiya.m baahirehi paccatthikehi paccaamittehi.

[03] ``katamehi sattahi nagaraparikkhaarehi suparikkhata.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare esikaa hoti gambhiiranemaa {gambhiiranemi (ka0)} sunikhaataa acalaa asampavedhii {asampavedhi (sii0 syaa0)}. iminaa pa.thamena nagaraparikkhaarena suparikkhata.m hoti ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m abbhantaraana.m ^a^T4.0108^ea^ guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare parikhaa hoti gambhiiraa ceva vitthataa ca. iminaa dutiyena nagaraparikkhaarena suparikkhata.m hoti ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya.

[03] ``puna ^a^P4.0107^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare anupariyaayapatho hoti ucco ceva vitthato ca. iminaa tatiyena nagaraparikkhaarena suparikkhata.m hoti ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahu.m aavudha.m sannicita.m hoti salaaka~nceva ^a^V2.0242^ea^ jevanika~nca {jevaniya~nca (sii0 a.t.tha0)}. iminaa catutthena nagaraparikkhaarena suparikkhata.m hoti ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahubalakaayo pa.tivasati, seyyathida.m -- hatthaarohaa assaarohaa rathikaa dhanuggahaa celakaa calakaa pi.n.dadaayakaa uggaa raajaputtaa pakkhandino mahaanaagaa suuraa cammayodhino daasakaputtaa. iminaa pa~ncamena nagaraparikkhaarena suparikkhata.m hoti ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare dovaariko hoti pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii a~n~naataana.m nivaaretaa ~naataana.m pavesetaa. iminaa ^a^M2.0479^ea^ cha.t.thena nagaraparikkhaarena suparikkhata.m hoti ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare paakaaro hoti ucco ceva vitthato ^a^T4.0109^ea^ ca vaasanalepanasampanno ca. iminaa sattamena nagaraparikkhaarena suparikkhata.m hoti ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. imehi ^a^P4.0108^ea^ sattahi nagaraparikkhaarehi suparikkhata.m hoti.

[03] ``katamesa.m catunna.m aahaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahu.m ti.naka.t.thodaka.m sannicita.m hoti abbhantaraana.m ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahu.m saaliyavaka.m sannicita.m hoti abbhantaraana.m ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahu.m tilamuggamaasaapara.n.na.m sannicita.m hoti abbhantaraana.m ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahu.m bhesajja.m sannicita.m hoti, seyyathida.m ^a^V2.0243^ea^ -- sappi navaniita.m tela.m madhu phaa.nita.m lo.na.m abbhantaraana.m ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m aahaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii.

[03] ``yato kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m imehi sattahi nagaraparikkhaarehi suparikkhata.m hoti, imesa~nca catunna.m aahaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m akara.niiya.m baahirehi paccatthikehi paccaamittehi. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yato ariyasaavako sattahi saddhammehi samannaagato hoti, catunna~nca jhaanaana.m ^a^P4.0109^ea^ aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti ^a^T4.0110^ea^ ^a^M2.0480^ea^ akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akara.niiyo maarassa akara.niiyo paapimato. katamehi sattahi saddhammehi samannaagato hoti?

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare esikaa hoti gambhiiranemaa sunikhaataa acalaa asampavedhii abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m `itipi so...pe0... buddho bhagavaa'ti. saddhesiko, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti; saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti; suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. iminaa pa.thamena saddhammena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare parikkhaa hoti gambhiiraa ceva vitthataa ca abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako hiriimaa hoti, hiriiyati kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. hiriiparikkho kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti; saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti; suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. iminaa dutiyena saddhammena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare anupariyaayapatho hoti ucco ceva vitthato ca abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ^a^V2.0244^ea^ ottappii hoti, ottappati kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, ottappati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. ottappapariyaayapatho ^a^T4.0111^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti ^a^P4.0110^ea^; saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti; suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. iminaa tatiyena saddhammena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahu.m aavudha.m sannicita.m hoti salaaka~nceva jevanika~nca abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. sutaavudho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akusala.m ^a^M2.0481^ea^ pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti; saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti; suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. iminaa catutthena saddhammena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahubalakaayo pa.tivasati, seyyathida.m -- hatthaarohaa assaarohaa rathikaa dhanuggahaa celakaa calakaa pi.n.dadaayakaa uggaa raajaputtaa pakkhandino mahaanaagaa suuraa cammayodhino daasakaputtaa abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. viiriyabalakaayo, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti; saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti; suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. iminaa pa~ncamena saddhammena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare dovaariko hoti pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii a~n~naataana.m nivaaretaa ~naataana.m pavesetaa abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya ^a^T4.0112^ea^ ^a^P4.0111^ea^. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako satimaa hoti paramena satinepakkena samannaagato cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa anussaritaa. satidovaariko, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti; saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti; suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. iminaa cha.t.thena saddhammena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare paakaaro hoti ucco ceva vitthato ca ^a^V2.0245^ea^ vaasanalepanasampanno ca abbhantaraana.m guttiyaa baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. pa~n~naavaasanalepanasampanno, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti; saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti; suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. iminaa sattamena saddhammena samannaagato hoti. imehi sattahi saddhammehi samannaagato hoti.

[03] ``katamesa.m ^a^M2.0482^ea^ catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii? seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahu.m ti.naka.t.thodaka.m sannicita.m hoti abbhantaraana.m ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati attano ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya okkamanaaya nibbaanassa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahu.m ^a^P4.0112^ea^ saaliyavaka.m sannicita.m hoti abbhantaraana.m ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya ^a^T4.0113^ea^ baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati attano ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya okkamanaaya nibbaanassa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahu.m tilamuggamaasaapara.n.na.m sannicita.m hoti abbhantaraana.m ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati attano ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya okkamanaaya nibbaanassa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no paccantime nagare bahu.m bhesajja.m sannicita.m hoti, seyyathida.m -- sappi navaniita.m tela.m madhu phaa.nita.m lo.na.m abbhantaraana.m ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya baahiraana.m pa.tighaataaya. evameva.m kho bhikkhave, ariyasaavako sukhassa ca pahaanaa ^a^V2.0246^ea^ dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati attano ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya okkamanaaya nibbaanassa. imesa.m catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii.

[03] ``yato ^a^P4.0113^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako imehi sattahi saddhammehi samannaagato hoti, imesa~nca catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. aya.m ^a^M2.0483^ea^ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akara.niiyo maarassa akara.niiyo paapimato''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ ``sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti ^a^T4.0114^ea^ ...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi sattahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamma~n~nuu ca hoti attha~n~nuu ca atta~n~nuu ca matta~n~nuu ca kaala~n~nuu ca parisa~n~nuu ca puggalaparopara~n~nuu ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamma~n~nuu hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamma.m jaanaati -- sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaatha.m udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m. no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamma.m jaaneyya -- sutta.m geyya.m...pe0... abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m, nayidha `dhamma~n~nuu'ti vucceyya. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamma.m jaanaati -- sutta.m geyya.m...pe0... abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m, tasmaa `dhamma~n~nuu'ti vuccati. iti dhamma~n~nuu.

[03] ``attha~n~nuu ca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhaasitassa attha.m jaanaati -- `aya.m imassa bhaasitassa attho, aya.m imassa bhaasitassa attho'ti. no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhaasitassa attha.m jaaneyya -- `aya.m imassa bhaasitassa attho, aya.m imassa bhaasitassa attho'ti, nayidha `attha~n~nuu'ti vucceyya. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tassa tasseva bhaasitassa attha.m jaanaati -- `aya.m imassa bhaasitassa attho, aya.m ^a^P4.0114^ea^ imassa bhaasitassa attho'ti, tasmaa `attha~n~nuu'ti vuccati. iti dhamma~n~nuu, attha~n~nuu.

[03] ``atta~n~nuu ^a^V2.0247^ea^ ca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attaana.m jaanaati -- `ettakomhi saddhaaya siilena sutena caagena pa~n~naaya pa.tibhaanenaa'ti. no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attaana.m jaaneyya -- `ettakomhi saddhaaya siilena sutena caagena pa~n~naaya pa.tibhaanenaa'ti, nayidha `atta~n~nuu'ti vucceyya. yasmaa ca, bhikkhave ^a^T4.0115^ea^, bhikkhu attaana.m jaanaati -- `ettakomhi saddhaaya siilena sutena caagena pa~n~naaya pa.tibhaanenaa'ti, tasmaa `atta~n~nuu'ti vuccati. iti dhamma~n~nuu, attha~n~nuu, atta~n~nuu.

[03] ``matta~n~nuu ^a^M2.0484^ea^ ca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu matta.m jaanaati ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m pa.tiggaha.naaya. no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu matta.m jaaneyya ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m pa.tiggaha.naaya, nayidha `matta~n~nuu'ti vucceyya. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu matta.m jaanaati ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m pa.tiggaha.naaya, tasmaa `matta~n~nuu'ti vuccati. iti dhamma~n~nuu, attha~n~nuu, atta~n~nuu, matta~n~nuu.

[03] ``kaala~n~nuu ca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu, kaala.m jaanaati -- `aya.m kaalo uddesassa, aya.m kaalo paripucchaaya, aya.m kaalo yogassa, aya.m kaalo pa.tisallaanassaa'ti. no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaala.m jaaneyya -- `aya.m kaalo uddesassa, aya.m kaalo paripucchaaya, aya.m kaalo yogassa, aya.m kaalo pa.tisallaanassaa'ti, nayidha `kaala~n~nuu'ti vucceyya. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaala.m jaanaati -- `aya.m kaalo uddesassa, aya.m kaalo paripucchaaya, aya.m kaalo yogassa, aya.m kaalo pa.tisallaanassaa'ti, tasmaa `kaala~n~nuu'ti vuccati. iti dhamma~n~nuu, attha~n~nuu, atta~n~nuu, matta~n~nuu, kaala~n~nuu.

[03] ``parisa~n~nuu ca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisa.m jaanaati -- `aya.m khattiyaparisaa, aya.m braahma.naparisaa, aya.m gahapatiparisaa, aya.m sama.naparisaa. tattha eva.m upasa"nkamitabba.m, eva.m ^a^T4.0116^ea^ .thaatabba.m ^a^P4.0115^ea^, eva.m kattabba.m, eva.m nisiiditabba.m, eva.m bhaasitabba.m, eva.m tu.nhii bhavitabba'nti. no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisa.m jaaneyya -- `aya.m khattiyaparisaa...pe0... eva.m tu.nhii bhavitabba'nti, nayidha `parisa~n~nuu'ti vucceyya. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisa.m jaanaati -- `aya.m khattiyaparisaa, aya.m braahma.naparisaa, aya.m gahapatiparisaa, aya.m sama.naparisaa ^a^V2.0248^ea^. tattha eva.m upasa"nkamitabba.m, eva.m .thaatabba.m, eva.m kattabba.m, eva.m nisiiditabba.m, eva.m bhaasitabba.m, eva.m tu.nhii bhavitabba'nti, tasmaa `parisa~n~nuu'ti vuccati. iti dhamma~n~nuu, attha~n~nuu, atta~n~nuu, matta~n~nuu, kaala~n~nuu, parisa~n~nuu.

[03] ``puggalaparopara~n~nuu ca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno {sabbatthapi idha aarambhe ``bhikkhuno'' tveva dissati} dvayena puggalaa viditaa honti. dve puggalaa -- eko ariyaana.m dassanakaamo, eko ariyaana.m na dassanakaamo. yvaaya.m puggalo ariyaana.m na dassanakaamo ^a^M2.0485^ea^, eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. yvaaya.m puggalo ariyaana.m dassanakaamo, eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.

[03] ``dve puggalaa ariyaana.m dassanakaamaa -- eko saddhamma.m sotukaamo, eko saddhamma.m na sotukaamo. yvaaya.m puggalo saddhamma.m na sotukaamo, eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. yvaaya.m puggalo saddhamma.m sotukaamo, eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.

[03] ``dve puggalaa saddhamma.m sotukaamaa -- eko ohitasoto dhamma.m su.naati, eko anohitasoto dhamma.m su.naati. yvaaya.m puggalo anohitasoto dhamma.m su.naati, eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. yvaaya.m puggalo ohitasoto ^a^P4.0116^ea^ dhamma.m su.naati, eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.

[03] ``dve puggalaa ohitasotaa dhamma.m su.nanti {su.nantaa (ka0)} -- eko sutvaa dhamma.m dhaareti, eko sutvaa dhamma.m na dhaareti. yvaaya.m puggalo sutvaa na dhamma.m ^a^T4.0117^ea^ dhaareti, eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. yvaaya.m puggalo sutvaa dhamma.m dhaareti, eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.

[03] ``dve puggalaa sutvaa dhamma.m dhaarenti {dhaarentaa (ka0)} -- eko dhaataana.m {dhataana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dhammaana.m attha.m upaparikkhati, eko dhaataana.m dhammaana.m attha.m na upaparikkhati. yvaaya.m puggalo dhaataana.m dhammaana.m attha.m na upaparikkhati, eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. yvaaya.m puggalo dhaataana.m dhammaana.m attha.m upaparikkhati, eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.

[03] ``dve puggalaa dhaataana.m dhammaana.m attha.m upaparikkhanti {upaparikkhantaa (ka0)} -- eko atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno, eko atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya na dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno. yvaaya.m puggalo atthama~n~naaya ^a^V2.0249^ea^ dhammama~n~naaya na dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno, eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. yvaaya.m puggalo atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno, eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.

[03] ``dve puggalaa atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa -- eko attahitaaya pa.tipanno no parahitaaya, eko attahitaaya ca pa.tipanno ^a^M2.0486^ea^ parahitaaya ca. yvaaya.m puggalo attahitaaya pa.tipanno no parahitaaya, eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. yvaaya.m puggalo atthahitaaya ca pa.tipanno parahitaaya ca, eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno {bhikkhunaa (sii0 syaa0)} dvayena puggalaa viditaa honti. eva.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu puggalaparopara~n~nuu hoti. ``imehi ^a^P4.0117^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannaagato ^a^T4.0118^ea^ bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro pa.n.dupalaaso hoti, attamanaa, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa tasmi.m samaye honti -- `pa.n.dupalaaso daani paaricchattako kovi.laaro nacirasseva daani pannapalaaso bhavissatii'''ti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro pannapalaaso hoti, attamanaa, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa tasmi.m samaye honti -- `pannapalaaso daani paaricchattako kovi.laaro nacirasseva daani jaalakajaato bhavissatii'''ti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro jaalakajaato hoti, attamanaa, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa tasmi.m samaye honti -- `jaalakajaato daani paaricchattako kovi.laaro nacirasseva daani khaarakajaato bhavissatii'''ti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro khaarakajaato hoti, attamanaa, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa tasmi.m samaye honti -- `khaarakajaato daani paaricchattako kovi.laaro nacirasseva daani ku.tumalakajaato {ku.dumalakajaato (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bhavissatii'''ti.

[03] ``yasmi.m ^a^V2.0250^ea^, bhikkhave, samaye devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro ku.tumalakajaato hoti ^a^T4.0119^ea^, attamanaa, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa ^a^M2.0487^ea^ tasmi.m samaye honti -- `ku.tumalakajaato daani paaricchattako kovi.laaro nacirasseva daani korakajaato ^a^P4.0118^ea^ {kokaasakajaato (sii0 syaa0), kosakajaato (ka0)} bhavissatii'''ti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro korakajaato hoti, attamanaa, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa tasmi.m samaye honti -- `korakajaato daani paaricchattako kovi.laaro nacirasseva daani sabbaphaaliphullo {sabbapaaliphullo (sii0 pii0)} bhavissatii'''ti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro sabbaphaaliphullo hoti, attamanaa, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa paaricchattakassa kovi.laarassa muule dibbe cattaaro maase pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaarenti.

[03] ``sabbaphaaliphullassa kho pana, bhikkhave, paaricchattakassa kovi.laarassa samantaa pa~n~naasayojanaani aabhaaya phu.ta.m hoti, anuvaata.m yojanasata.m gandho gacchati, ayamaanubhaavo paaricchattakassa kovi.laarassa.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yasmi.m samaye ariyasaavako agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya ceteti, pa.n.dupalaaso, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako tasmi.m samaye hoti devaana.mva taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, pannapalaaso, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako tasmi.m samaye hoti devaana.mva taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, jaalakajaato, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako tasmi.m samaye hoti devaana.mva taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro.

[03] ``yasmi.m ^a^M2.0488^ea^ ^a^V2.0251^ea^, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, khaarakajaato, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako tasmi.m samaye hoti ^a^T4.0120^ea^ devaana.mva taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ^a^P4.0119^ea^ ariyasaavako piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, ku.tumalakajaato, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako tasmi.m samaye hoti devaana.mva taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, korakajaato, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako tasmi.m samaye hoti devaana.mva taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati, sabbaphaaliphullo, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako tasmi.m samaye hoti devaana.mva taavati.msaana.m paaricchattako kovi.laaro.

[03] ``tasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye bhummaa devaa saddamanussaaventi -- `eso itthannaamo aayasmaa itthannaamassa aayasmato saddhivihaariko amukamhaa gaamaa vaa nigamaa vaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii'ti. bhummaana.m devaana.m sadda.m sutvaa caatumahaaraajikaa devaa...pe0... taavati.msaa devaa... yaamaa devaa... tusitaa devaa... nimmaanaratii devaa... paranimmitavasavattii devaa... brahmakaayikaa devaa saddamanussaaventi -- `eso itthannaamo aayasmaa itthannaamassa aayasmato saddhivihaariko amukamhaa gaamaa vaa nigamaa vaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii'ti. itiha tena ^a^P4.0120^ea^ kha.nena tena muhuttena yaava brahmalokaa saddo {saadhukaarasaddo (sii0 a.t.tha0, ka0 a.t.tha0)} abbhuggacchati ^a^T4.0121^ea^, ayamaanubhaavo khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0489^ea^ ^a^V2.0252^ea^ kho aayasmato saariputtassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``ki.m nu kho, bhikkhu, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanto akusala.m pajaheyya, kusala.m bhaaveyyaa''ti? atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi -- ``satthaara.m kho, bhikkhu, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanto akusala.m pajaheyya, kusala.m bhaaveyya. dhamma.m kho, bhikkhu...pe0... sa"ngha.m kho, bhikkhu...pe0... sikkha.m kho, bhikkhu...pe0... samaadhi.m kho, bhikkhu...pe0... appamaada.m kho, bhikkhu...pe0... pa.tisanthaara.m kho, bhikkhu sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanto akusala.m pajaheyya, kusala.m bhaaveyyaa''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi -- ``ime kho me dhammaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa, ya.mnuunaaha.m ime dhamme gantvaa {gahetvaa (ka0)} bhagavato aaroceyya.m. eva.m me ime dhammaa parisuddhaa ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasa"nkhaatataraa ca. seyyathaapi naama puriso suva.n.nanikkha.m adhigaccheyya parisuddha.m pariyodaata.m. tassa evamassa -- `aya.m kho me suva.n.nanikkho parisuddho pariyodaato, ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m suva.n.nanikkha.m gantvaa {gahetvaa (ka0)} kammaaraana.m dasseyya.m. eva.m me aya.m suva.n.nanikkho sakammaaragato parisuddho ceva bhavissati parisuddhasa"nkhaatataro ca. evameva.m {kho (ka0)} me ime dhammaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa, ya.mnuunaaha.m ime dhamme gantvaa {gahetvaa (ka0)} bhagavato aaroceyya.m. eva.m me ime dhammaa parisuddhaa ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasa"nkhaatataraa caa'''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa ^a^P4.0121^ea^ saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena ^a^T4.0122^ea^ bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `ki.m nu kho, bhikkhu, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanto akusala.m pajaheyya, kusala.m bhaaveyyaa'ti? atha kho tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `satthaara.m kho, bhikkhu, sakkatvaa garu.m ^a^M2.0490^ea^ katvaa upanissaaya viharanto akusala.m pajaheyya, kusala.m bhaaveyya. dhamma.m kho, bhikkhu ^a^V2.0253^ea^ ...pe0... pa.tisanthaara.m kho, bhikkhu sakkatvaa...pe0... kusala.m bhaaveyyaa'ti. atha kho tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `ime kho me dhammaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa, ya.mnuunaaha.m ime dhamme gantvaa bhagavato aaroceyya.m. eva.m me ime dhammaa parisuddhaa ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasa"nkhaatataraa ca. seyyathaapi naama puriso suva.n.nanikkha.m adhigaccheyya parisuddha.m pariyodaata.m. tassa evamassa -- aya.m kho me suva.n.nanikkho parisuddho pariyodaato, ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m suva.n.nanikkha.m gantvaa kammaaraana.m dasseyya.m. eva.m me aya.m suva.n.nanikkho sakammaaragato parisuddho ceva bhavissati parisuddhasa"nkhaatataro ca. evameva.m me ime dhammaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa, ya.mnuunaaha.m ime dhamme gantvaa bhagavato aaroceyya.m. eva.m me ime dhammaa parisuddhaa ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasa"nkhaatataraa ^a^P4.0122^ea^ caa'''ti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta ^a^T4.0123^ea^! satthaara.m kho, saariputta, bhikkhu sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanto akusala.m pajaheyya, kusala.m bhaaveyya. dhamma.m kho, saariputta, bhikkhu sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanto akusala.m pajaheyya, kusala.m bhaaveyya. sa"ngha.m kho...pe0... sikkha.m kho... samaadhi.m kho... appamaada.m kho... pa.tisanthaara.m kho, saariputta, bhikkhu sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanto akusala.m pajaheyya, kusala.m bhaaveyyaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``imassa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. so vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo dhamme sagaaravo bhavissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo dhammepi so agaaravo''.

[03] ``so vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo dhamme agaaravo sa"nghe sagaaravo bhavissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo dhamme agaaravo sa"nghepi so agaaravo.

[03] ``so vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo dhamme agaaravo sa"nghe agaaravo sikkhaaya sagaaravo ^a^V2.0254^ea^ bhavissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo dhamme agaaravo sa"nghe agaaravo sikkhaayapi so agaaravo.

[01] ``imassa ^a^M2.0493^ea^ kho, saariputta, mayaa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attho da.t.thabbo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ ``bhaavana.m ananuyuttassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato ki~ncaapi eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata me anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucceyyaa'ti, atha khvassa neva anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati. ta.m kissa hetu? `abhaavitattaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. kissa abhaavitattaa? catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m, catunna.m sammappadhaanaana.m, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m, pa~ncanna.m balaana.m, sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m, ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa dvaadasa vaa. taanassu kukku.tiyaa na sammaa adhisayitaani, na sammaa pariseditaani, na sammaa paribhaavitaani ^a^P4.0126^ea^. ki~ncaapi tassaa kukku.tiyaa ^a^T4.0127^ea^ eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata me kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjeyyu'nti, atha kho abhabbaava te kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjitu.m. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi, bhikkhave, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani na sammaa adhisayitaani, na sammaa pariseditaani, na sammaa paribhaavitaani. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhaavana.m ananuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato ki~ncaapi eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata me anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucceyyaa'ti, atha khvassa neva anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati. ta.m kissa hetu? `abhaavitattaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. kissa ^a^V2.0257^ea^ abhaavitattaa? catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m, catunna.m sammappadhaanaana.m, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m, pa~ncanna.m balaana.m, sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m, ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa.

[03] ``bhaavana.m anuyuttassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato ki~ncaapi na eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata me anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucceyyaa'ti, atha khvassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati. ta.m kissa hetu? `bhaavitattaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. kissa bhaavitattaa? catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m, catunna.m sammappadhaanaana.m, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m, pa~ncanna.m balaana.m, sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m, ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M2.0494^ea^, bhikkhave, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa dvaadasa vaa. taanassu kukku.tiyaa sammaa adhisayitaani, sammaa pariseditaani, sammaa paribhaavitaani ^a^T4.0128^ea^. ki~ncaapi tassaa kukku.tiyaa na eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata me kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjeyyu'nti, atha kho bhabbaava te kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjitu.m. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi, bhikkhave, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani sammaa adhisayitaani, sammaa pariseditaani, sammaa paribhaavitaani. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhaavana.m anuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato ki~ncaapi na eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ^a^P4.0127^ea^ me anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucceyyaa'ti, atha khvassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati. ta.m kissa hetu? `bhaavitattaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. kissa bhaavitattaa? catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m...pe0... ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, phalaga.n.dassa {palaga.n.dassa (?)} vaa phalaga.n.dantevaasikassa vaa dissanteva {khiiyante (ka0)} vaasija.te {dissanti a"ngulipadaani (sii0), a"ngulapadaani dissanti a"ngulapada.m (ka0)} a"ngulipadaani dissati {dissanti (syaa0)} a"ngu.t.thapada.m {dissanti a"ngulipadaani (sii0), a"ngulapadaani dissanti a"ngulapada.m (ka0)}. no ca khvassa eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `ettaka.m me ajja vaasija.tassa khii.na.m, ettaka.m hiyyo, ettaka.m pare'ti, atha khvassa khii.ne `khii.na'nteva ~naa.na.m hoti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhaavana.m anuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato ki~ncaapi na eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `ettaka.m me ajja aasavaana.m khii.na.m, ettaka.m hiyyo, ettaka.m pare'ti, atha khvassa khii.ne `khii.na'nteva ~naa.na.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V2.0258^ea^, bhikkhave, saamuddikaaya naavaaya vettabandhanabaddhaaya {vettabandhaaya (ka0)} cha maasaani udake pariyaadaaya hemantikena thale ukkhittaaya vaataatapaparetaani ^a^T4.0129^ea^ bandhanaani, taani paavussakena meghena abhippavu.t.thaani appakasireneva parihaayanti {pa.tippassambhanti (sii0 syaa0)}, puutikaani bhavanti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhaavana.m anuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato appakasireneva sa.myojanaani pa.tippassambhanti, puutikaani bhavantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M2.0495^ea^ ^a^P4.0128^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. addasaa kho bhagavaa addhaanamaggappa.tipanno a~n~natarasmi.m padese mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m {sa~njotibhuuta.m (syaa0)}. disvaana maggaa okkamma a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amu.m mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho vara.m -- ya.m amu.m mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m aali"ngetvaa upanisiideyya vaa upanipajjeyya vaa, ya.m vaa khattiyaka~n~na.m vaa braahma.naka~n~na.m vaa gahapatika~n~na.m vaa mudutalunahatthapaada.m aali"ngetvaa upanisiideyya vaa upanipajjeyya vaa''ti? ``etadeva, bhante, vara.m -- ya.m khattiyaka~n~na.m vaa braahma.naka~n~na.m vaa gahapatika~n~na.m vaa mudutalunahatthapaada.m aali"ngetvaa upanisiideyya vaa upanipajjeyya vaa, dukkha~nheta.m, bhante, ya.m amu.m mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m aali"ngetvaa upanisiideyya vaa upanipajjeyya vaa''ti.

[03] ``aarocayaami vo, bhikkhave, pa.tivedayaami ^a^T4.0130^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, yathaa etadeva tassa vara.m dussiilassa paapadhammassa asucisa"nkassarasamaacaarassa pa.ticchannakammantassa assama.nassa sama.napa.ti~n~nassa abrahmacaarissa brahmacaaripa.ti~n~nassa antopuutikassa avassutassa kasambujaatassa ya.m amu.m mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m aali"ngetvaa upanisiideyya vaa upanipajjeyya vaa. ta.m kissa hetu? tatonidaana~nhi so, bhikkhave, mara.na.m ^a^P4.0129^ea^ vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m ^a^V2.0259^ea^ vaa dukkha.m, na tveva tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya.

[03] ``ya~nca kho so, bhikkhave, dussiilo paapadhammo asucisa"nkassarasamaacaaro...pe0... kasambujaato khattiyaka~n~na.m vaa braahma.naka~n~na.m vaa gahapatika~n~na.m vaa mudutalunahatthapaada.m aali"ngetvaa upanisiidati vaa upanipajjati vaa, ta~nhi tassa {ta.m hissa (ka0)}, bhikkhave, hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho vara.m -- ya.m balavaa puriso siise vaa gahetvaa khandhe vaa gahetvaa ^a^P4.0133^ea^ tatta.m ayoma~nca.m vaa ayopii.tha.m vaa abhinisiidaapeyya vaa abhinipajjaapeyya vaa, ya.m vaa khattiyamahaasaalaana.m vaa braahma.namahaasaalaana.m vaa gahapatimahaasaalaana.m ^a^V2.0262^ea^ vaa saddhaadeyya.m ma~ncapii.tha.m {ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m vaa (ka0)} paribhujjeyyaa''ti? ``etadeva, bhante, vara.m -- ya.m khattiyamahaasaalaana.m ^a^T4.0135^ea^ vaa braahma.namahaasaalaana.m vaa gahapatimahaasaalaana.m vaa saddhaadeyya.m ma~ncapii.tha.m paribhu~njeyya, dukkha~nheta.m, bhante, ya.m balavaa puriso siise vaa gahetvaa khandhe vaa gahetvaa tatta.m ayoma~nca.m vaa ayopii.tha.m vaa abhinisiidaapeyya vaa abhinipajjaapeyya vaa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, yo ime satta satthaare titthakare kaamesu viitaraage anekasataparivaare sasaavakasa"nghe padu.t.thacitto akkoseyya paribhaaseyya, bahu.m so apu~n~na.m pasaveyyaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``yo, bhikkhave, ime satta satthaare titthakare kaamesu viitaraage anekasataparivaare sasaavakasa"nghe padu.t.thacitto akkoseyya paribhaaseyya, bahu.m so apu~n~na.m pasaveyya. yo eka.m di.t.thisampanna.m puggala.m padu.t.thacitto akkosati paribhaasati, aya.m tato bahutara.m apu~n~na.m pasavati. ta.m kissa hetu? naaha.m, bhikkhave, ito bahiddhaa evaruupi.m khanti.m vadaami yathaama.m sabrahmacaariisu''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, gaavii vajjhaa aaghaatana.m niiyamaanaa ya.m yadeva paada.m uddharati, santikeva ^a^V2.0266^ea^ hoti vadhassa santikeva mara.nassa; evameva.m kho, braahma.na, govajjhuupama.m {gaaviivajjhuupama.m (sii0 syaa0)} jiivita.m manussaana.m paritta.m lahuka.m bahudukkha.m bahupaayaasa.m ^a^M2.0503^ea^ mantaaya.m boddhabba.m, kattabba.m kusala.m, caritabba.m brahmacariya.m, natthi jaatassa amara.na''nti.

[03] ``tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussaana.m sa.t.thivassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi, pa~ncavassasatikaa kumaarikaa ala.mpateyyaa ahosi. tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussaana.m cha.leva aabaadhaa ahesu.m -- siita.m, u.nha.m, jighacchaa, pipaasaa, uccaaro, passaavo. so hi naama, bhikkhave, arako satthaa eva.m diighaayukesu manussesu eva.m cira.t.thitikesu eva.m appaabaadhesu saavakaana.m eva.m dhamma.m desessati -- `appaka.m, braahma.na, jiivita.m manussaana.m paritta.m lahuka.m bahudukkha.m bahupaayaasa.m mantaaya.m boddhabba.m, kattabba.m kusala.m, caritabba.m brahmacariya.m, natthi jaatassa amara.na'''nti.

[03] ``etarahi ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `appaka.m jiivita.m manussaana.m paritta.m lahuka.m bahudukkha.m bahupaayaasa.m mantaaya.m boddhabba.m, kattabba.m kusala.m, caritabba.m brahmacariya.m, natthi jaatassa amara.na'nti. etarahi, bhikkhave ^a^T4.0141^ea^, yo cira.m jiivati so vassasata.m appa.m vaa bhiyyo. vassasata.m kho pana, bhikkhave, jiivanto tii.niyeva utusataani jiivati -- utusata.m hemantaana.m, utusata.m gimhaana.m, utusata.m vassaana.m. tii.ni kho pana, bhikkhave, utusataani jiivanto dvaadasa {dvaadasa.m (sii0 ka0)} yeva maasasataani jiivati -- cattaari maasasataani hemantaana.m ^a^P4.0139^ea^, cattaari maasasataani gimhaana.m, cattaari maasasataani vassaana.m. dvaadasa kho pana, bhikkhave, maasasataani jiivanto catuviisatiyeva addhamaasasataani jiivati -- a.t.thaddhamaasasataani hemantaana.m, a.t.thaddhamaasasataani gimhaana.m, a.t.thaddhamaasasataani vassaana.m. catuviisati kho pana, bhikkhave, addhamaasasataani jiivanto chatti.msa.myeva rattisahassaani jiivati -- dvaadasa rattisahassaani hemantaana.m, dvaadasa rattisahassaani gimhaana.m, dvaadasa rattisahassaani vassaana.m. chatti.msa.m kho pana, bhikkhave, rattisahassaani jiivanto dvesattatiyeva {dvesattati~n~neva (syaa0), dvesattati~nceva (ka0)} bhattasahassaani bhu~njati -- catuviisati bhattasahassaani hemantaana.m, catuviisati bhattasahassaani gimhaana.m, catuviisati bhattasahassaani vassaana.m saddhi.m maatutha~n~naaya saddhi.m bhattantaraayena.

[03] ``tatrime bhattantaraayaa kapimiddhopi bhatta.m na bhu~njati, dukkhitopi bhatta.m na bhu~njati, byaadhitopi ^a^V2.0267^ea^ bhatta.m na bhu~njati, uposathikopi bhatta.m na bhu~njati ^a^M2.0504^ea^, alaabhakenapi bhatta.m na bhu~njati. iti kho, bhikkhave, mayaa vassasataayukassa manussassa aayupi sa"nkhaato {sa"nkhaata.m (?)}, aayuppamaa.nampi sa"nkhaata.m, utuupi sa"nkhaataa, sa.mvaccharaapi sa"nkhaataa, maasaapi sa"nkhaataa, addhamaasaapi sa"nkhaataa, rattipi sa"nkhaataa, divaapi sa"nkhaataa, bhattaapi sa"nkhaataa, bhattantaraayaapi ^a^T4.0142^ea^ sa"nkhaataa. ya.m, bhikkhave, satthaaraa kara.niiya.m saavakaana.m hitesinaa anukampakena anukampa.m upaadaaya; kata.m vo ta.m mayaa etaani, bhikkhave, rukkhamuulaani etaani su~n~naagaaraani. jhaayatha, bhikkhave, maa pamaadattha; maa pacchaa vippa.tisaarino ahuvattha. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii''ti. dasama.m.
